ftbquests.chapter.attack_of_the_drones.q: 亚马龙贸易网络提供各种随机预设的村民交易并且该交易每个Minecraft天刷新一次。亚马龙贸易网络也存在着一些数据包或模组的交易且这些交易始终存在，所以请定期检查数据包。
我们狂热的探险家们大概会对末影苹果贸易特别感兴趣。一个末影苹果可以换取一本跃行附魔书。附在靴子上时，它将为你提供永久的自动跳跃。非常适合周围那些大大小小的山！
漫游
给气动工艺的压力室提供压力即可将物品压缩成新的物品。
输入与输出必须通过压力室接口进行，压力需要通过压力室气阀输入。你可以选择性地将非边缘处的压力室方块替换为玻璃，来观察里面发生了什么。
此多方块结构必须是3x3、4x4或5x5的正方体。
宝贵的压力

The &bAerial Interface&r, when pressurized, &nexposes your inventory as if were in a chest&r. Any items inserted into the interface enter your inventory instead. Your main inventory is accessed from any horizontal side while your armor is the top face. This can be changed in the UI.

Having this setup also provides &6water breathing&r, at an additional air pressure cost. If you provide it with FE it will also &6wirelessly charge all your items&r! A dispenser upgrade will &6automatically eat for you&r as well as allow you to pipe experience in and out.
This can be used to keep your chestplate charged and your chestplate can be upgraded to charge all other PNC armors and items.

Pneumatic Armor, though it has fairly low defense at the start, can be extensively upgraded. These upgrades can give it more armor, toughness, speed, flight, nightvision and more! The Chestpiece can also be upgraded to charge all of your pneumatic devices.
This armor does not have infinite durability like some other tech armors but can be upgraded to automatically repair with pressure.
I am (Compressed) Iron Man!
A &bThermopneumatic Processing Plant&r is used to process liquids into other liquids.
LPG and Coal together in this machine can produce &6Liquid Plastic&r.
It can also be used in fuel cracking.
Heavy fuels can be cracked into lighter ones. This means &6Diesel&r can be turned into &6Kerosene&r, which can turn into Gasoline and then further into LPG.
Speed upgrades can go in most PNC Machines and makes them operate faster but consume more air pressure.
The &bCharging Station&r allows you to &6fill items with compressed air&r, allowing them to work.
It will only fill items to have equal pressure that the Charging Station itself has.
If the item has higher pressure than the Charging Station, it will &6empty itself back into the network&r.
The &bCharging Module&r can be placed on a pressure tube and it will charge all items in the inventory it's facing.
It can also discharge them if their pressure exceeds the Tube's. If you put these on two connected Ender Chests you can effectively &6teleport air pressure&r!
The Minigun will shoot Minigun Ammo using compressed air by holding right-click.
Sneak click the minigun to insert up to 4 Minigun ammo boxes. Minigun Ammo can be combined with a potion to apply its effects on hit.
You can install several useful upgrades to the minigun in the charging station to improve its functionality.
The Camouflage Applicator can make camouflageable blocks such as tubes and heat pipes look like other blocks.
Sneak + Right Click the applicator on a block (like grass or diamond) then click on any camouflageable block to set its appearance.
&bAir Pressure&r is what powers most Pneumaticcraft machines. It is &6measured in bars&r. The more bars, the higher the pressure.
Make sure to &6read the PNC:R Manual&r for more information.
Air moves from high-pressure areas to low-pressure areas and will try to equalize throughout the system.
If the air pressure in a machine or tube is higher than it can support the &cmachine will explode&r!
PneumaticCraft machines and tools all have a specific &6volume&r (measured in ML) that represents how much air they hold at 0 bar. This can be increased with Volume upgrades.
Machines use compressed air to operate, which constantly lowers pressure in the system as they consume it.
Air Pressure
Air Pressure 101
Now that we have a way to make Compressed Iron, we can get started with &bPneumaticCraft!&r
To start, we'll need to make some &bPressure Tubes&r, which are used to carry &6compressed air&r. If the pressure inside of a tube reaches 5.0 bar, it will explode. :)

Air pressure also takes time to build up and change, it isnt transferred instantly. Air pressure also &6relies on a closed system&r, meaning it will escape from open pipe connections and will lower the pressure of the entire system. Right clicking on a connection with a &6Pneumatic Wrench&r will close that section.
Pushing Pressure
作物架可提升任何种植在上面的树木或作物的生长速度。它很便宜，而且不需要维护，真的很好用！
高速农业！
&bHeat&r is another mechanic unique to Pneumaticcraft.&6 Heat disperses&r to adjacent blocks, including air.
If certain heat sources have their heat dispersed entirely, it can &6convert to a different block&r. An example of this would be using lava to heat a machine and it eventually cooling to obsidian.

As PNC has compatibility with other mods, a great source of heat is blaze burners or liquid blaze burners. If you give a blaze burner a straw you can pipe in diesel or other burnable liquids for high heat production at low cost.
Later game when you can generate Mekanism heat, it will also work!
You can prevent heat from dissipating in the air by making sure the block is covered by any block that isnt air. &6Thermal Lagging&r works well for this.

Some operations are endothermic (Heat Using) while others may be exothermic (Heat Producing). This will depend on the machine and recipe so be sure to look at the recipe and plan your heat management accordingly.

An important note is that since these machines share heat it is often useful to put multiple machines that require similar temperatures touching each other to make heat management easier. You can pipe between them with &6dispenser upgrades&r.
Thermodynamics
The &bVortex Tube&r uses compressed air to &6make one side cold and the other side hot&r.
The higher the airflow, the more extreme the temperature difference will be.

&bHeat sinks&r can help to more quickly dissipate heat from a block they are touching. Any heat sinks over or under 60/-60C will hurt you if you touch them. The effectiveness can be greatly increased by using an air grate to vent air over the fin. These used in conjunction with vortex tubes should be able to effectively handle all of your heating and cooling requirements.
The &bFluid Mixer&r mixes two fluids, as the name would imply. It can make either an item or another fluid.
One significant use for this is producing &6Biodiesel&r, which is the corner stone of your enhanced power production.
► If you have a &6good pressure system&r, why not use some of your spare generation to get some &bextra FE&r?
Let's make a Pneumatic Dynamo
Pressure → FE
Although a bit expensive, this &bSolar Air Compressor&r may be an interesting Air Compressor to have attached to your system as it is a &6Passive Source of Pressure&r!
- Also, &e&n350°C&r is where you'll &e&nget the most efficiency&r&r out of this device.
- But be aware tho, &4if it gets too hot it will shutdown&r as a safety measure, thus requiring manual maintenance.
Let's make a Solar Compressor
Using the Sun to Pressurize your System!
Its a quite simple &6Air Compressor&r, simply provide some &eFE or EU&r and voilá, &bPressure&r!
► And just like any other &6Air Compressor&r, make sure that your system is well balanced, you don't want to &4explode&r your brand new &bFlux Compressor&r!
Let's make a Flux Compressor!
By applying a Polyethylene layer to your &6Basic Pressure Tubes&r you're able to &bReinforce them&r, making them more resistant to &bhigher pressures&r.
- Now they're able to handle up to &b10 bar of pressure&r.
&c&nMake sure to balance your pressure system accordingly&r&r.
Using Polyethylene!
Reinforced Pressure Tubes
- &5First&r make yourself a &bProgramming Table&r, you're going to use it to write what your &bDrone&r is going to do.
- &5Then&r make sure to have some &6Puzzle Pieces&r with you, &nevery step&r of the code requires &61 Puzzle Piece&r.
- Its also important to have &aGPS tools&r with you, as you'll use them to set cordinates for your &bDrone&r instructions.
Seems complicated, but its actually quite simple.
Harvesting Crops with Drones Part I

- Although there's a &6pre-programmed harvesting drone&r, in this quest we are going to teach you how to make one yourself, this should give you a good headstart on how this &bprogramming system&r works.
- &5With this&r you can notice that &b"Drone Code"&r is done via &b"Code Blocks/Steps"&r you can start by placing the &b"Start Block"&r and then add a block for each respective step of the process.

- &5Also notice&r that when adding commands to &aharvest and/or import&r something from a chest, an &b&n"Area Block"&r&r is needed, and to easily add the corret cordinates, simply &bleft click with your GPS Tool&r to paste the desired cordinates.

- &5Oh and don't forget&r that you can also add &a"Filter Blocks"&r to certain commands, in this given code, you may want to set a &aFilter for the Hoe&r you wish to use instead of a default netherite one.
- &5First&r, make sure to open your &2Programming Table&r and import this basic code:
&5And as a bonus tip&r, its a good practice to add a &9"Standby"&r command at the end so your drone can shut itself off when no work is needed, thus &9not wasting its pressure&r.
&oRead the Next Quest for a Simple Tutorial on how to set a Collector Drone too!&r
&8&oIt shouldn't be too hard, look for the "Import Button" at the top left of the GUI and after that click on the "paste from clipboard" option in the bottom. &r
Click Here for the Code
{image:ftbneotech:textures/quest_zh/quest_drone_1.png width:120 height:100 align:center fit:true}
Making a Basic Harvester Drone
Harvesting Crops with Drones Part II
使用前面任务的奖励，你应该可以制作一个亚马龙平板电脑了。你可以用它在亚马龙网络上进行所有种类的村民交易。确保你已经潜行+右击将它连接到了存储容器上，然后就愉快地交易吧！压力耗尽时记得给它充能。
亚马龙网络

- Although there's a &6pre-programmed collector drone&r, in this quest we are going to teach you how to make one yourself, this should give you a good headstart on how this &bprogramming system&r works.
- &5If you didn't read&r the previous quest, &c&nmake sure to do so&r&r, as the explanation here will be much simpler than the previous one!
- &5Like mentioned previously&r, with this given code you should only need to tweak &athe values&r to your specific needs, like changing the &blocations&r :)

- &5Also good to note&r that some &b"Code Blocks"&r like the &2"Export to Chest"&r one may have some additional config options that can be accessed via &nright click&r, in this case, you can select from wich side the &bdrone&r will access the &2chest&r.
- &5First&r, make sure to open your &2Programming Table&r and import this basic code:
&8&oIt shouldn't be too hard, look for the "Import Button" at the top left of the GUI and after that click on the "paste from clipboard" option in the bottom. &r
Click Here for the Code
{image:ftbneotech:textures/quest_zh/quest_drone_2.png width:120 height:100 align:center fit:true}
Making a Basic Collector Drone
Harvesting Crops with Drones Final Part
&bReinforced Stone&r is the basis for most advanced pneumatic machinery. It's hardened and thermally resistant nature makes it a perfect material to contain the high pressure of pneumatic devices.
You'll need a good bit of these to craft a lot of the machines in the mod!

The basic &bAir Compressor&r is one of the first and easiest methods of &6generating pressure&r. This device will &6consume burnable materials&r like coal or charcoal to generate air pressure for the pneumatic network. Be careful &4not to over pressurize&r your systems or they will &4blow up!&r
We've gifted you a &6Saftey Tube Module&r to help get you started. These might work for now, but are not a good long term solution as they will occasionally vent pressure, which wastes fuel.
&bGenerating&r &dAir Pressure&r
►你现在可以使用&6亚马龙平板电脑&r购买&b电路板蓝图&r并制造你的第一台&b紫外线灯箱&r了！
一个紫外线灯箱
来制作电路板的第一部分
用&6蚀刻&r酸填充这个，并插入在&6紫外光灯箱&r里面曝光过的&b空印刷电路板&r。
可以在上面随意受热
50℃可以逐渐加快蚀刻（但蚀刻酸在加热时会被缓慢消耗）
如果你想使其自动化，你可以从侧面取出未组装的印刷电路板
或从顶上/底下取出失效的印刷电路板。
把一些&3{item.pneumaticcraft.transistor}&r和&3{item.pneumaticcraft.capacitor}&r安装在&6{item.pneumaticcraft.unassembled_pcb}&r最终会得到&b{item.pneumaticcraft.printed_circuit_board}&r
If you haven't been using &6Gauge Modules&r to control your &3pressure system&r... perhaps it is a good idea to start doing so.
- But... using an &bExpansion Module&r could make this process much easier and precise!
- By applying an &bExpansion Module&r to a &6Gauge Controller&r you'll expand its functionalities, allowing you to precisely control its &credstone behavior&r, you can even set a &eLinear Graph&r!
让我们来做扩展模块吧！
功能扩展中！

The &bAssembly Line&r is a multiblock machine allowing the crafting of precision recipes. All parts of the assembly line must touch and pressure needs to be provided to the controller. Additionally, a &bprogram must be inserted&r into the assembly controller. Most recipes will use the laser program but the drill as well as the combination drill and laser are needed for some.
&bAssembly IO Units&r control the input and output of the recipes. They must be able to reach an inventory, such as a chest, and the assembly platform. They can reach anything with a 3x3 area.
Assembly Line
Advanced pressure tubes can handle up to 25 Bar and 4 times the volume. Be careful that the machines you connect these to can handle the pressure or use a regulator.
Advanced Pressure Tubes
ftbquests.chapter.caveman_exploring.ques: 像大部分Minecraft冒险那样，从撸树开始吧！只有这种获得木头的方式吗？是的，神圣的行为永远不会被整合包制作者修改！
&b你的第一节必修课——&r&2原木&r
在开始冒险之前，你应该制作一些专业工具！
一把&b木镐&r和一套&b石制工具&r非常适合你过渡到铁或更多先进材料。
专业工具
在前期，你可以从野外找到各种各样的食物！找些食物准备出发，但是前期最好多从树上摘些&c苹果&r。
你可以用这些来驯服一匹&6马&r，这是长途旅行必备的坐骑。
一天一苹果
&b马&r有多种多样的样貌和颜色，而且它们还有不同的属性！通过在头部穿戴&6单片眼镜&r并潜行，你将能够看到马的属性。繁育马匹来获得更好的属性将是一节很有趣的事，但目前，任何一只马都能够帮助你穿越地形。
首先，你需要&a使用马刷怪蛋&r来获得一匹马！生成之后，你就可以开始通过喂苹果来驯服它，并且尝试右击来骑乘。它可能会把你甩下来一段时间，但是坚持多次骑乘直到冒出爱心，证明你已经驯服它了！
只要你驯服马，你可以在上面放鞍并骑乘它。然后，它将会与你绑定并且&6&n默认按住X键来召唤&r，召唤你已经驯服的坐骑。
骑马时，默认按Y键进入战斗模式，该模式允许在骑乘时自由角度的瞄准和使用武器。
嗨哟，马儿！我们走！
与马结缔友谊
默认情况下，小地图处于关闭状态直到制作出第一张地图。
地图由纸和一个指南针合成，并将实时提供附近区域的渲染以及你在其上的位置。通常情况下，在这个整合包中你需要非常多的纸，所以为了帮助解决这个问题，这里有颗纸树。
当它们长大时，树皮也会随之成熟，可以用斧头右击获得纸。树皮可以用骨粉加快生长。
&6&n提示：&r如果你需要很多甘蔗，可以尝试制作&a子沙&r。当你在子沙上种植仙人掌或甘蔗时，你可以放置拉杆在子沙附近并且不停拉动拉杆，子沙上的作物将会加快生长。
对探索的甜蜜渴望
把&b地图&r放在手上，你就可以连接全球制图系统了。现在应该可以使用小地图以及全屏地图，默认按M键开启。在这里，可以为位置设置坐标点，并查看你或其他人已声明或强制加载的区块。
开启制图
&d发现北斗信号&r！
通过把&6工作台&r和箱子组合，你将会赋予它一个&d保存&r魔咒，这多亏了Enchanted Blocks模组。
当你关闭工作台界面时，这个高级的工作台将保留其物品栏的物品。
保存工作台
更好的&6工作台&r
在早期，&b工业大麻种子&r非常有助于获得线，它也可以用来制作&6坚韧布料&r。如果你打算制作&6背包&r，这将非常重要！
ftbquests.chapter.caveman_goes_tech.ques: 开采一些&6粗铁矿石&r并用它们粗糙的制作一把&b工程师锤&r。尽管现在它不是&o最优&r选择，但眼下我们仍可以用它来粉碎矿石。
使用这把锤子，你可以在你合成栏中将&6粗铁矿石&r变成粉末。在熔炉中熔炼这些铁粉来获得你的第一批铁锭！
锤子对于&e沉浸工程&r多方块结构的一锤定音也同样终要！
&6工程师锤&r
在你可以制造一些铁锭后，你可以制造一个&b锤锻台&r！这可以让你粉碎任何矿石甚至可以将锭加工成板，环，杆等形状。
神秘魔咒
虽然这做起来很简单，但从锤子的制造成本考虑，这种制造材料的方法被认为是非常低效的。
你应该尽快进步到使用&6蒸汽研磨机&r来替代你完成这些工具。
你现在有了铁的来源，你可以尝试制作一个铁砧来将你获得的附魔书敲到机器上。如果你运气绝佳找到了一个&d附魔台&r，那你还有更多的附魔选择！否则你得等到你拥有了装配机才能自己进行附魔台的制作。
这个任务开启了以下章节：
&e沉浸工程&r&6高炉&r仍可以熔炼&6钢&r并且不再需要&7蒸汽&r。缺点是熔炼速度变慢，高炉砖也需要&6蒸汽高炉&r来完成制作。你可以自由&l选择&r是否使用这个多方块结构。
沉浸工程高炉
&b蒸汽高炉&r是你在&e现代化工业&r模组中建造的第一个多方块杰作。你需要为它&2提供&r&6蒸汽&r和&6生铁粉&r来制作&6钢锭&r。
除了控制器方块，你还需要任务中展示的流体和物品&2输入仓&r和物品&输出仓&r。剩下的方块需要使用耐火砖块。你可以将输入仓和输出仓放在结构中的不同位置，手持一个扳手或&2输入仓&r/&c输出仓&r来查看可用位置。
&b钢&r是一种非常坚固的金属，可以用来制作很多工业机器或制作&6升级物品&r来为你已有的&6黄铜机器&r升级为钢制机器。
&l&6提示&r：你会需要非常非常非常多这个材料。所以尽可能保证钢一直处于生产中的状态。
&b线材轧机&r可以用来制作很多种导线和细导线。你将会经常使用到这台机器来制作电路和更多错综复杂的机械、物品和齿轮。
It's &6generally worth upgrading&r to the highest tier that your current technological progression will allow for.
&bMixers&r are used to combine multiple components and sometimes liquids into new ingredients. Make sure to pay attention to the tier of mixer required for recipes!
2 eu/t is a &bsteam mixer&r. 4 eu/t is a steel mixer, any higher than that will require an electric mixer or better.

The &bCompressor&r will take many gem-like materials, among other things, and &6compress&r them into a useable &6plate&r form. A perfect example of this can be seen in the reward from this quest! Why 2 Diamond Plates specifically?
Dimension Hopping
&bSteel Boilers&r produce twice as much &7Steam&r as Bronze Boilers.

&bSteel upgrades&r can be shape crafted OR applied directly to bronze tier machines in world by &6right clicking&r the upgrade onto them. This will perform an in-place upgrade to the new steel variant and immediately be ready for processing!
&bCompressed Iron&r is a much stronger version of the smelted iron we normally make, but it can only be created under high pressures.

Unfortunately, in order to build something that can withstand that much pressure, you'll first need to &6compress Fericore Ingots&r into compressed iron to start with. Later on, you'll be able to make this directly from iron in a &bPressure Chamber&r.

The &b Ferricore Ingot&r is created by allowing the &6Primogel Goo&r to absorb an &6Iron Block&r next to it. Once this process completes it will turn in to a &6crystal&r which you can mine for &63-4 Raw Ferricore&r.
Dire Technologies
在你制作了锤锻台之后，你会想要制作一些&铁板&r用于大量的合成配方中。
我们将会制作一个&6合金窑&r，所以准备好你的&6工程师锤&r！
铁板
With the mixer, you can now create &bPrimogel Goo&r. This mysterious goo will &6slowly transform&r some types of materials placed next to it.

Start off by creating some Fericore Ingots by placing a block of iron next to the goo and allowing it to completely transform into a crystal. For each crystal you mine, you'll get 3-4 raw ore, and &cFortune does not affect the drop rate&r.
Your boilers will need a constant supply of water. You can do this with buckets but that gets tedious.

Build a &bBronze Water Pump&r, place water blocks around it, and then give it a steam input for power. It will generate water constantly which you can pipe to your boilers or anywhere else you need water!
The &6bronze compressor&r can do any recipes up to &64 Eu/t&r, but in order to compress Ferricore into compressed iron, we'll need a stronger compressor.
The &eSteel Compressor&r can do recipes up to &e8 Eu/t&r and will be sufficient for this task!
The &bSteam Quarry&r uses &7steam&r and &6Drills&r to produce resources over time. Each operation has a &6low chance to consume the drill&r so you'll want to provide it with plenty of  replacements.
The good news is the system creates a more than net positive loop of resource income and is self sustaining once you fully automate it!
&l&6Note&r: Different drills and tiers will yield different ores, so check the uses to best target the ores you want the most.
Your First &dQuarry&r!
Now that you have bronze, you'll be able to make &eModern Indstrialization&r pipes. These are highly versatile pipes that are absolutely worth using.
With this tool, you can copy settings of a pipe onto the card, and then place it in your offhand. Any pipe you place like this will automatically copy the settings on the card!
You can stack up to &63 pipes in the same block space&r, you can &6dye&r them so they wont connect to each other, and you can configure each of their connection states with the wrench.
Think that's cool? Just wait, there's more.

You can go even further create a facade out of any block for the pipes to blend seemlessly into your build by &6sneak+right clicking on a block&r you want the pipes to display as, and then &6right clicking to apply the block to the pipe bundle&r. This will consume blocks from your inventory, and can easily be popped back off when you sneak+right click the block with a wrench.
And to make copying settings of pipes easier, you have been given a &6Pipe Configure Card&r!
The Pipe Configurator
The next thing you'll need as you work towards making circuitry is some &6Rubber!&r

Rubber can be manufactured from &bSynthetic Oil&r or &bSynthetic Rubber&r at a better yield. You can make it via &ePneumaticCraft&r or a &6Mixer&r. The &ePNC&r route is more efficient but will require a bit more setup, the choice is yours.
Synthetic Oil or Rubber Bucket
For the next step, you'll need to turn the rubber into &bRubber Sheets&r to make your circuit plates.
&eAnalog Circuits&r are the basis for all LV technology. You'll want to make a bunch of these in bulk as crafting them one by one can get very tedious when you just need one for a craft.
We cannot Resist this

&eModern industrialization&r has several different cables for each tier. For &6LV&r, for example, there is &6copper, silver and Tin Cables&r. All can transfer the same amount and there is no cable loss.
The reason for the different types is that they &6wont connect with each other&r, allowing you to place &6multiple in the same blockspace&r (up to 3) for ease of wiring!

&eModern Industrialization&r utilizes many of these sub components in their general craft through most tiers of technology. In addition to being &6crafting ingredients&r they act as &6functional upgrades&r. For example, you can &6insert a motor into your pipes to speed them up&r. Consult the &l&6Modern Industrialization manual&r for a full list. You'll want to keep a good stock pile of these on hand.
Components and You
&6合金窑&r是你在游戏前期获取许多种合金的方式，包括你第一批的&6青铜锭&r。合金窑使用窑砖在&62x2&r的范围内搭建完成。
当你使用窑砖搭建成2x2正方体完成后，用&6工程师锤&r右击来使合金窑成型！

&dSilk Touch&r is important for maximizing your ore outputs. By mining them with silk touch, processing them in block form will give you more products and byproducts than standard mining. Luckily, Modern Industrialization provides a solution to this! The miraculous &bSteam Mining Drill&r can &6mine a 3x3&r area AND has a &6Silk Touch mode&r.
To use it, you'll need to provide it &9water&r by just having a bucket in your inventory or by right clicking a water source block.

To power the drill, open your inventory and drag a &6fuel source&r like coal over top of the drill and then &6right click on the drill&r to deposit the fuel. You can change the drill mode to silk touch by &6Shift+Right&r clicking while holding the drill&r.
&lNOTE: &rLater, you'll be able to upgrade it into an FE powered drill!
I had a Drill joke but it bit the dust.
Upgrading to a &6Steel Pump&r will keep up with even more machines, and you can upgrade easily by applying a &bSteel Upgrade kit&r to your bronze pumps!

If you want to upgrade your pumps further, you'll need to first craft an &6Electric Packer&r and produce some &bLapis Plates&r. With these, you can upgrade the Steel Water Pump into a &bWater Tank&r which acts as an infinite water source!
When placed near 2 blocks of water, the tank will produce 1000mb of Water 20 times per second at no fuel or &7steam&r costs!

&cRedstone Ore&r drops as a block and must be processed to get redstone dust. To do this, we can process it through the &bForge Hammer&r for now. Don't worry, you can increase your yield later on using machines!
Storage Wars
Powered by Sticks and Stones
If you haven't noticed, all &cbasic ore smelting mechanics have been disabled&r&r.

► In order to start processing ores, &6you'll need to first start with the Forge Hammer and then move onto special machinery&r dedicated to doing so, such as the Macerator, Crushers, Enrichment Chambers and more. If you're ever stuck trying to figure out how to process an ore, it's best to refer to EMI.
► &aFuture Quests&r should provide you with a bit more detailed info on each of the processing systems you may use as you unlock the technology to create them.
► If you hold &6shift&r while hovering over an ore type, the tooltip will tell you the best Y lvl to mine for that ore.
Also, here's a cookie.
Here's a brief explanation of the changes
Click Here
You're gonna Crush IT!
Once you have iron tier tools or better, you can harvest and process &6Gold&r! Once you have both gold and redstone, you have two very important resources for making machinery!
Wheels of Fortune Chapter
A Golden Opportunity.

&6Creosote Oil&r from your coke ovens can be used to create a &btreated wood&r. This will enable you to craft many useful items and is a gateway into everything from chicken breeding to deeper &eImmersive Engineering&r machinery.
Want to try your hand at Chicken Breeding for fun and profit?
What the Cluck?
Oily Wood

The &bcutting machine&r can make some plates more efficiently but is also used for cutting blocks into plates for materials that would otherwise lack direct plate recipes. It will also give you 6 planks per log when cutting wood.
It's important to note that all operations with the cutting saw take a &6small amount of lubricant&r, so automating it is advised.
You're probably finding a lot of &6Copper&r on your mining adventures, which is a good thing because you'll need it!
A lot of early machines require crafting lots of parts, like &bBolts&r and &bRods&r. You'll need to use your &bForge Hammer&r to convert your ingots into the parts you need.
And you'll do this for more than just Copper, so don't be afraid to grab all of the ores you see!
Nuts and Bolts
If you see a villager, you can sneak-right click to pick them up! You're definitely just shoving an entire human (?) being into your exceptionally large back pocket.
Making a &6Villager Trading Hall&r is usually a good idea, as there are a lot of great trades that can help you through the early game!
&6Easy Villagers&r
使用你崭新的合金窑，以锭或者粉的形式放入3个&6铜&r和1个&6锡&r来将它们制作成&6青铜&r！
Don't worry about making a villager breeding area, because the Easy Villager mod puts it all into a one block solution!
Supply the &6Breeder&r with 2 Villagers and some food, and it'll do its magic to create some baby villagers.
This is probably the only magic that is allowed in this pack.
Easy Villagers allows you to shove a villager in a glass box with its workstation block to create an easy way to trade!
You can reroll trades that you don't like using &6C&r by default. Looking for an easy way to automate trades? Make the &6Auto Trader&r!
Hint: &6Modern Industrialization&r has a villager by using a &bForge Hammer&r!
&6Trading In A Block&r
&b青铜锅炉&r是你第一种用于生产&7蒸汽&r的机器，旨在为所有青铜时代的科技提供动力！
为了让他开始工作，第一步先将&9水&r灌入其中，不仅可以使用水桶手动灌水，还可以使用&6水泵&r和管道来将水自动灌入。这台机器还需要一点&6可燃燃料&r像是煤炭或者木炭，就可以开始工作了！
在你讲两种原料放入锅炉后，就可以从有方形的输出面泵出&7蒸汽&r，你也可以使用&6扳手&r来改变它的输出面！
你最先制造的一些基础机器应该是&6青铜熔炉&r和&6研磨机&r。
青铜熔炉由&b蒸汽&r提供热源来熔炼物品，速度比普通的原版熔炉稍快。
&b研磨机&r可以使矿石增产并可以从少量物品中获得副产品。你可以从之前的任务奖励钻石锤来采集黑曜石！
粉碎和切割
现代工业化的&b蒸汽焦炉&r比沉浸工程的焦炉速度更快。但是需要&7蒸汽&r才能持续运转。这是一个类似于普通焦炉一样的多方块结构，只是需要&6物品和流体出入口&r来正常运转。
虽然这看起来非常麻烦但是绝对值得制作！这个焦炉需要2个&6输入口&r，一个用来输送&b蒸汽&r（被视为液体），另外一个用于输入&6煤炭&r。这会产出需要2个&6输出口&r的副产物，杂酚油和焦煤！
更快的焦炉
&b焦炉&r需要时间将&6煤炭&r转换为&6焦煤&r。
建造一座焦炉需要你搭建由&6焦炉砖&r为材料3x3x3的正方体，然后使用&6工程师锤&r右击某一面中间的方块来完成这个多方块结构。
在这个过程中会产生一种名为&6杂酚油&r的副产物。你可以把它作为燃料使用，或用于制作&6防腐木板&r和&6防腐木棍&r。
较慢的焦炉
在&6高炉&r中熔炼&b生铁粉&r即可获得&6钢&r。&6蒸汽高炉&r会比沉浸工程中的高炉熔炼速度更快。
沉浸工程中的&6高炉&r不需要&7蒸汽&r进行运转，并且之后可以使用&6高炉预热器&r进行升级。但不管怎么说你都是需要基础的&7蒸汽&r&6高炉&r来制作&6沉浸工程高炉砖&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dire_technologies.ques: The different tiers of Goo are all capable of processing the previous tier's items so there is no reason to not use the best Goo you can currently create. That being said, some materials do require better goos. Your next material will be blazegold which you'll need &bBlazebloom Goo&r next to a gold block. After the gold is consumed you'll be left with the new material which you can then alloy into an ingot.
After a trip to the end for some dragon's breath and getting your LV infrastructure going you'll be ready for some VoidShimmer Goo. This will allow you to craft &bcelestigems&r.

The ultimate tier metal, the Eclipse Ingot, combines the sculk and void essence to create tools of unparalleled ability. Each tool will have their unique powers amplified to the max. Your ore sanner becomes XRAY, you can mine up to 7x7 areas, and instantly break blocks! Like the celestigem, you can also create a Paxel with all of the abilities.
Made from a block of diamond being absorbed by VoidShimmer Goo. Tier 3 Ingredient for tools and weapons.

Celestigem tools inheret all previous tool abilities but also get the new ability to bind to an inventory by sneak+right clicking to enable &bteleport mode&r. Once linked, your drops from mob kills, harvesting or mining will all teleport directly to the linked inventory!
In addition, Celestigem tools now &buse energy&r instead of durability and will need portable power. The Personal Generator or batteries should work well for this.

Blazebloom soil has a higher growth speed increase than the previous tier. You need a Blazebloom Hoe to create this soil. Crops that fully grow on this soil self harvest and then despawn in a few seconds.
Observe Blazebloom Soil
VoidShimmer soil also has an even faster growth speed increase and can &bteleport&r the crops it autoharvests to the inventory linked to the hoe you created the soil with!
Observe VoidShimmer Soil
Shadowpulse soil has the largest growth speed increase of all the soils and maintains the VoidShimmer soil's ability to teleport crops it harvests.
Observe Shadowpulse Soil

Using Ferricore ingots, an enderpearl and a diamond you can create a highly customizable Item Collector. It will pickp any items in its configurable range and deposit them in the inventory they're attached to.

Converted from blocks of coke coal, the energy density continues! You'll often come out at a net loss in power production converting the coke coal blocks into blaze embers but you'll need it for some recipes and to further convert to higher tiers.

&nNOTE:&r Higher tier coals burn faster and produce more energy per tick in the peronal generator as well as Simple Generators. As high as 960 FE/t. This is important for providing enough power on the go for the higher tier tools energy requirements.

The final tier of energy density. Like the previous tier you'll only get 1-2 drops per harvest but your average energy density will far exceed that of the raw coke coal block you started the process with.
The energy density continues to increase, this time you'll only get 1-2 drops per ore but overall the net energy density of the materials will increase.

These simple blocks do what you'd expect, they will break or place blocks in the world and can be controlled by redstone. The more advanced versions can place and break large areas at once for some very interesting automations.
The final tier Goo will take you to the depths of the &aDeep Dark&r. You'll need to collect some sculk and Echo shards to infuse to make &bShadowpulse Goo&r.
This Goo will allow you to convert a block of &bNetherite&r into Eclipse Ingots which all of the top tier tools and machines are made from. Beware the Warden...

These simple generators provide a small amount of FE energy to power devices. The speed at which they produce FE will dynamically scale with the type of fuel you use. If you use higher tier Goo coals like Blaze Ember, Void Flame or Eclipse Ember coals it will produce more FE/T.
The swapper will &bswap&r two blocks. You used the wrench to link to the source swapper by &nright clicking&r.

Once you've set the source coordinates you right click on the destination swapper with the bound wrench to bind the destination swapper. In the interface you can set it to &bswap&r blocks or entities (Useful for moving mobs or animals large distances). When you're ready to swap just give the block a &4redstone pulse&r with a button and off it goes!
You need two of them.
The energy transmitter accepts energy from its bottom side and distributes forge energy to all machines in range that can accept energy.

Celestigem and Eclipse Ingots are capable of making a multitool called a Paxel. It combines all of the other tools into a super tool which can perform all of the special abilities of the other tools and be enchanted.

Primal coal is a slightly condensed version of coal. Place a block of coal or charcoal next to primogel and it will convert. You'll get between 3-4 primal coals per harvest which each smelt 3x as much as normal coal.
They have the added benefit of being able to be turned into coke coal. This is a very effective way of converting your charcoal tree farms into coke coal.
&bFerricore Tools&r have an innate &6veinmining&r property that makes them better than default Iron Tools.
All higher tier tools from this mod have the traits of the previous, so don't worry about leaving upgrades behind!

Hold shift while hovering over the tool to see its &ospecial abilities&r. You can sneak+right click while holding the tool to open its options menu where you can set the keybind for its abilties or toggle individual ones on or off.
Any Ferricore Tool
Ferricore Tools
The fuel cannister allows you to insert any burnable fuel into it and it will count towards its internal fuel value. You can then use the canister itself in any furnace to provide fuel. Very handy!
The Ferricore and greater material Hoes have a unique ability to transform farmland into primogel goo farmland. This farmland cannot be trampled. Each tier of the soil will gain more abilities.
Primogel soil also has a slight growth speed increase and can support sugarcane and cactus.
Observe Primogel Soil

The pocket generator is a portable battery source that allows you to insert any burnable fuel (or a portable fuel cannister) and convert that into FE energy. That FE energy can then be used to charge any devices in your inventory that require FE.
Made from a block of gold being absorbed by &bBlazebloom Goo&r. Tier 2 Ingredient for tools and weapons.
Blazegold tools can also be repaired with &4lava&r! Neat.
ftbquests.chapter.equivalency.quests8.su: 它们中的某几个真的很大
ftbquests.chapter.equivalency.title: 等价交换
To start enhancing your gear and machines, you'll need either an &6Enchantment Table&r to generate random enchants on your items, or an &6Anvil&r to apply &6Enchanted Books&r to them.

Most Vanilla blocks can be enhanced with an enchanting table or by applying the enchant directly with books. There are also repeatable quests here to obtain books. You can combine the basic tier 1 books together to make higher tier variants. Craft the basic blocks here and you'll be given a few enchants to try out for yourself!
Mines blocks without breaking them into raw ores and shards. Useful for further processing or moving fragile blocks like glass.
The Storing enchant increase the amount of slots a chest or barrel can have, adding more for each tier of the enchantment.
The Preservation Enchant allows blocks like crafting tables and chests to maintain their inventory.

The Exporting upgrade will cause the block to automatically eject its outputs to adjacent blocks. An example of this would be a furnace or blast furnace automatically outputting its smelted ingredients to a barrel.
The speed enchant generally increases the speed the block works at such as smelting speed or transfer speed for a hopper.

Solar Radiance will convert furnaces into Solar Powered furnace. You can still give them normal fuel during the night or bad weather but otherwise as long as they have access to the sky they will smelt things at no fuel cost.
Fuel efficiency enchant makes the block burn fuel slower and smelt more items per fuel.
Sometimes you'll loot items or blocks that have enchantments you don't like. The grindstone can be used to remove them.

The Soulbound enchant will allow items to be bound to you through death. It should be noted that each time you die there is a chance to drop an enchantment level. Once it reaches 0 the enchant will degrade entirely.
ftbquests.chapter.function.quests0.title: Grant EMC View
ftbquests.chapter.function.title: Functional
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests0.desc: The LV Steam Turbine produces 32 EU/t. Note that you need Modern Industrialization power to run MI machines. You can use Tin Cables to connect things up.
Each network of cables can only support up to a certain limit. Silver, Copper and Tin cables are LV cables. They can pull a total of 256 Eu/T.

If you need more than that you should use different cables to make seperate energy nets. In this way you could transfer up to 768 Eu/T worth of LV power. When you're ready to make even MORE power you can look at transforming up to MV or HV with transformers and using higher tier cables.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests1.desc: The assembler is used to construct many advanced machines, components and frames for technological progression. It will require power, items and sometimes fluid as inputs to create the final product. Pay attention to the EU/T requirements of the recipe to make sure you're applying the correct power required to execute the given recipe.
NOTE: You can lock input and output slots to prevent certain recipes from crafting. This is important to know for automation. Also, you're going to want A LOT of these eventually!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests10.des: You'll be using it to &6Assemble&r the &bCurrent Tier Circuits&r of course but its good to know that it is a good idea to &2keep some for later&r as you'll be &dimproving this one for the next tier of circuit too&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests10.sub: Just like a Surf Board... for Electronic Components!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests11.des: It's worth upgrading your large bronze boilers into the advanced versions now that you can make the circuitry. They produce four times as much steam! Make sure you use the wrench on the multiblock to see the new shape and block requirements.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests12.des: &bA Distillery&r will be &2Essential&r until you're able to make yourself a &6Distillation Tower&r later in progression, until there, processing a variety of &aOils and Chemicals&r should done via &bthis machine&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests13.des: The Large Steam Boiler is a multiblock which performs the same task as many small Bronze or Steel Boilers. You can run one with just one Bronze Water Pump feeding it water, but you will eventually need up to 2 steel water pumps to fully provide enough water.

You can convert the logs to charcoal in a coke oven and burn both the charcoal and the creosote in the boiler. You may need several coke ovens to keep up with demand. One Large Bronze Boiler can support 8 LV Steam Turbines constantly.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests14.des: Each machine in the LV age will require these &bBasic Machine Hulls&r. You'll use &cA LOT&r of them.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests15.des: To fuel one LV Steam Turbine, you will need either 4 Bronze Boilers or 2 Steel Boilers. You can submit this quest with either combination in your inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests16.des: Sounds like a really simple &bmachine&r, and in reality it is, but with its simplicity comes some &avery usefull and essential recipes&r!
- &bA Packer&r will be used to &6Print AE2 Processors&r for example!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests17.des: &bThis Machine Casing&r will be using in a variety of &6Multiblock Structures from MI&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests17.sub: Let's make some Heatproof Machine Casings!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests17.tit: A Machine Casing capable of sustaining High Temps!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests18.des: &bA Mixer&r is also a &2very essential&r machine to have from MI, as you'll be using it to &6mix&r a variety of &3Dusts&r and/or &6Materials/Components&r!
- For example, you can &6mix&r &3Quarts Dusts with a piece of Sand&r to get your first &6Silicon&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests19.des: By using your recently obtained &bPacker&r, its time to make some &bPrinted Circuitry&r!
- You'll be further developing this &6Circuits into Processors&r in &2the following quests&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests19.sub: Yeah baby, time for some AE2!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests2.desc: The Drill is an electric-powered mining implement which can be upgraded using various augments. Note that to use an augment of a higher tier, it requires all of the previous tiers to be installed.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests20.des: By using your recently obtained &bPacker&r, its time to make some &bPrinted Silicon&r!
- You'll be further developing this &6Printed Wafer into Processors&r in &2the following quests&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests21.des: &e应用能源&r能让你将物品转化为数据形式以便于快速访问和存储。在开始之前你需要一个&能源接收器&r来将能量转化为可以为数字网络供电的形式。前往&e存储战争&r章节以深入探索AE。
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests22.des: Large steel tanks can hold a large buffer of liquids for steam or other resources. They also look pretty cool so have at it!
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests23.des: The Atomic Reconstructor can take a variety of materials and convert them to more advanced materials using energy. The item to be transformed must be placed in front of the reconstructor and then a redstone pulse applied to activate it. This requires FE Power which you can transform automatically from MI Power Cables or any FE source.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests24.des: Molten redstone is a volatile substance from superheating redstone that is used to recrystalize many advanced components. You'll want an automated supply of this eventually. You have multiple options for how you wish to process it. You can either run redstone through a steam blast furnace or you can mix with lava in a Thermopneumatic Processing Plant to process it faster and more efficiently.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests25.des: The empowerer will further allow you to take reconstructed atomic matter such as void and enori crystals and empower them with material essences to create an even more refined material. The recipe for each is shown in JEI but you'll need a combination of items, the energized crystal and more power fed into the bottom of the display stands to complete the transformation.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests26.des: Your steam quarry can be upgraded directly into electric by using the same multiblock. This new and improved quarry will allow you to use better drills like gold, steel, and stainless. If you wish to get into petrochemicals and sustainable diesel fuels it may be worth building an oil drilling rig soon with aluminum drills for Virulent Mixture.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests27.des: &bStorage Units&r allow for saving EU for a later time. They work under the same tiering restrictions as any generators.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests3.desc: &bA Chemical Reactor&r is an &aEssential Machine&r to have from &3MI&r!
- You'll house pretty much any &bChemical Reaction&r needed for &6materials and components&r.
- For example, &6P-Doped Silicons&r for the &anext quest&r! =)
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests4.desc: The Polarizer gives a magnetic charge to various items. Primarily useful for making Magnetic Steel Rods.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests5.desc: The Electric Blast Furnace is a multiblock designed for smelting. In particular, it is required for smelting Bauxite Dust into Alumin(i)um Nuggets, before you can process it in the Electrolyzer (which you will still need to smelt the dust in the EBF anyway).
Since this machine runs on electricity, you will need an LV Energy Input.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests6.desc: To start off processing aluminum you'll smelt bauxite dust in the Electric Blast Furnace into Aluminium nuggets. You'll be able to make aluminum more efficiently a bit later but for now this is the primary method and will get you started.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests7.desc: To get Silicon, you'll need to track down a Meteorite. These are easily found by using a Meteorite Compass, made by sending a Compass through the Polarizer.
Each spawns 9 Flawless Budding Certus, plenty to get you going.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests8.desc: By using Doped Silicon Plates over their regular counterparts, you can greatly increase the yield from their various recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.quests9.desc: More advanced processors will be the key to unlocking many new technologies from Mekanism to MV tier to a great deal of new utility options.
ftbquests.chapter.lv_and_me.title: 3. LV and Me
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests0.des: The Metallurgic Infuser is the core of &eMekanism&r machinery.
The &bMetallurgic Infuser&r is used to &6create alloys&r, the most important of enriched alloys, as well as control circuits.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests10.de: &bReinforced Alloy&r are the next tier of Mekanism alloys.
It is very suggested to use the &6Enrichment Chamber&r to get the most out of your infusing materials.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests11.de: The final tier of &6Mekanism&r alloys - the &bAtomic Alloy&r
This will allow the creation of top tier control circuits and teleportation cores.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests12.de: &bAdvanced Control Circuits&r are used for more advanced machines.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests13.de: Crafted from the previous Tier, the &bElite Control Circuits&r are the next Circuit in line.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests14.de: Crafting the &bUltimate Control Circuit&r will grant you access to the highest tiers of the mod.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests2.des: &bSteel Casings&r are the basis of most of the mod's machines.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests20.de: Using the &bThermal Evaporation Chamber&r to create Brine is one path of making renewable salt and lithium.
You probably want to have at least 2 &bThermal Evaporation Chambers&r.
The taller the multiblock, the faster it will work. You can provide heat with from a fuelwood or resistive heater.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests21.de: The &bMekaSuit&r is an incredibly powerful &6upgradable armor set&r.
Its &6Upgrade Units&r can be installed in the &6Modification Station&r.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests22.de: The &bSupercritical Phase Shifter&r is a multiblock that uses a large amount of FE to &6convert Polonium gas into Antimatter gas&r.
The Polonium gas can be converted from Polonium Pellets in a chemical oxidizer.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests23.de: You can convert &6tiny plutonium&r and &6dark matter&r into &bPolonium&r inside an implosion compressor.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests24.de: The &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r is used to turn pressurized gases and liquid into item and gas outputs using forge energy and a high pressure system.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests25.de: Applying a &bBasic Tier Installer&r to most &eMekanism&r machines will transform them into a &6Factory&r.
Factories have &6multiple processing slots&r, so you can make more compact setups.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests26.de: The &bAdvanced Tier Installer&r will convert Basic Factories to &6Advanced Factories&r, which have 5 parallel processing lines.
It is suggested to use &6Energy Upgrades&r to reduce the machine's energy usage.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests27.de: This &bElite Tier Installer&r gives you a whopping 7 slots of processing.
In addition to this, with some Speed upgrades, you can probably process all your resources with ease
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests29.de: The chemical oxidizer simply converts items into gaseous form using Forge Energy.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests3.des: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r certain items, as well as &6refine ores&r... if you can get any.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests8.des: The basic tier mekanism control circuit. It's crafted by enriching osmium with redstone.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.quests9.des: With some Redstone and Osmium Ingots you can finally start making some &bBasic Control Circuits&r as well as producing steel much faster, without the need for a blast furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.mekanicles.title: Mekanicles
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests0.descr: The Advanced Machine Hull is used to build all of your Medium Voltage (MV) machinery. You can also upgrade your existing LV machines by inserting one into its upgrade slot. This will allow the machine to accept and process MV tier energy and recipes.
What, you didn't think you'd have to build all new machines each tier did you?
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests10.desc: Larger motors are required for more torque in higher end machines and pumps.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests16.desc: The oil drilling rig takes drills and provides a liquid. With access to aluminum you can pump Virulent Mixture which can be refined to crude oil in a Thermo Pneumatic Processing Plant. Once you have access to stainless steel drills you can migrate to shale oil and it's byproducts.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests17.desc: Centrifuging redstone will give you ruby dust along with several other useful byproducts including neodynium, which you'll use for advanced magnetic applications and superconducting cabling eventually.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests18.desc: The centrifuge spins materials at a very high RPM rate to seperate key components into layers for further extraction. Your most important use of this right away will be processing raw iron to obtain manganese byproducts.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests19.desc: With some oil and the distilleries you can now begin refining petrochemical byproducts. There are a lot of byproducts and almost all of them will be useful. Distilleries however, can only refine 1 byproduct at a time so you'll need several of these get everything setup. Later you'll be able to make distillation towers and get all of the byproducts at once.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests20.desc: You can refine diesel in two ways. First you can use distilleries to get light and heavy fuels and then a mixer to combine them into diesel or you can refine crude oil using a Thermo Pneumatic Processing Plant which will require pressure and heat. The choice is your but diesel will be your next stepping stone to better energy production.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests21.desc: Diesel generators can provide on demand power for diesel fuel. Unlike boilers they will only consume fuel when producing energy making them an attractive option when you wont fully consume your maximum output regularly.
Remember, diesel can also fuel your boilers should you wish to use it for that.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests22.desc: With Polyethylene available, you can craft upgrades for every machine. These upgrades will allow machines to get overclocked to perform their functions faster at the cost of greater energy consumption (FE/tick).
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests23.desc: Centrifiguring redstone will yield crushed chromium which you can further process into chromium dust. As a nice byproduct you'll also get pure aluminum dust piles to smelt for aluminum ingots.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests24.desc: By centrifuging your raw iron you can extract some manganese as well. You'll need this to form more advanced alloys like stainless steel.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests25.desc: By electrolyzing salt you can extract chlorine, a useful chemical in fundamental chemistry.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests26.desc: Combine hydrogen and chlorine to make hydrochloric acid (HCL) in equal parts in a chemical reactor. This liquid is useful for breaking down other chemicals and solids.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests27.desc: You can combine crushed chromium and hydrochloric acid in a chemical reactor to make Chromium Hydrochloric Solution. This is then electroyzed to obtain tiny piles of chromium as well as reclaiming some of the hydrogen and chlorine from the acid mix.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests28.desc: Similar to the process of exctracting chromium, crushed manganese must be combined in a chemical reactor with a strong acid, Sulfuric Acid in this case. This will provide you with Manganese sulfuric solution. Which you then electrolyze for tiny manganese dust. This process will yield a return of some of the sulfuric acid.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests29.desc: The air intake can go into the vacuum freezer or later the pressurizer to make liquid air. This liquid air can then be broken down into atmospheric gases and utilized in metallurgical processes.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests4.descr: These larger pumps provide more power to enable faster and more pressurized machines. You'll use many in your factory so it's worth having an automation chain in place for them.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests5.descr: Now that you can upgrade the EBF to Kanthal coils you'll be able to cook at much higher temperatures to forge better metals. Make sure in the user interface of the EBF you tell it that it's a Kanthal tier EBF or it won't form.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests7.descr: The electrolyzer uses electrical current to split the bonds between chemicals. You can electrolyze water into hydrogen and oxygen or bauxite dust into aluminum directly instead of smelting it for nuggets.
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.quests9.descr: The steam turbine consumes up to 128mb/t of Steam and produces 128 Eu/T of Power (or 512 FE/t). If you haven't already upgraded your large bronze boilers to the advanced versions, not might be the time!
ftbquests.chapter.mvvvvvvv.title: 4. This Tier Is Kinda Mid
ftbquests.chapter.quantumania.title: 7. Quantumania
ftbquests.chapter.steelyeyed_engineer.qu: The Engineer's workbench is used to create a variety of speciality components from blueprints. You can craft some of the blueprints and others you may need to find or trade villagers for. Most of these components can later be automated in the Automated Workbench.

The Metal Press is a 3×1×3 multiblock machine. It quickly transforms metal ingots into Plates, Rods, making it a valuable tool for your crafting and building projects. This can provide a simplified on demand production of gears, plates and rods.

Gears are a 6:1 ingot to gear ratio while plates and rods are 1:1. Plates are equivalent to MI in cost while rods and gears are slightly more costly than using MI machines but simpler to automate and produce on demand.
Hard Pressed
&3Actually Addictions&r offers a very interesting machine capable of brewing what you probably drink every morning!
- With some &6Coffe Beans&r, &eEnergy&r and &9Water&r.... a &bCup of Coffe&r!
Also don't forget to check &2JEI&r for some extra things that you may add to &benhance your &bCoffe&r! and remember, &nsome of them are stackable&r!
&8&o~ Here, give me your Cup of Coffe and I'll fill it for you with my Special Brew!&r&r
with this Actually Addictions Machine!
Let's brew some Coffe
And with your recent unlocked materials, you're now able to make &bAdvanced Coils&r!
- With this &bCoil&r you're finally able to make most of the content added by &3Actually Additions&r!
For all your Advanced Additions needs.
A Advanced Component

Perhaps you're not satisfied with your current &6MI Macerator Performance&r... or perhaps you just want to &cspice up some of your Automations&r with a &dReally Pretty Machine&r well in any case, this &bCrusher&r may be the perfect solution for you!
- The &bAA Crusher&r is able to handle most of the &2Crushing Recipes&r so you should be able to use it even for some &2Ore Processing&r!
Let's make an AA Crusher!
Crushing with RF
Just like previously mentioned about the &6Single Crusher&r.... it all applys but now in &bDouble&r!
- 2x &2Processing
&r- 2x &eEnergy Consumption
&r- 2x &cSpice&r &8(&oLisan al Gaib)&r
If a Single Crusher don't satisfy your needs...
Crushing with even more Spice!
Tired of your &6Boring Single Furnaces&r?
- &3Actually Additions&r can solve just that! a &bPowered Furnace&r is capable of &aSmelting 2 items at a single time&r! really usefull if you want pretty smelters in some of your automation lines.
Double th Fun!
Double Smelting with RF!
By adding a &6Special Core&r and an &6Advanced Coil&r it is time to improve your simple &2Steam Drill&r and make this very powerfull &3Actually Additions Drill&r!
- But you may ask, what are the benefits of this &bDrill&r? well, you can add &eUpgrades&r to it!
- By &dShift Clicking with it&r you can open its internal buffer and &eadd as many upgrades you want&r!
Time to Improve your Steam Drill!
Drilling your way through!
Want to &dclear a section of your base&r from all the &2Grass&r, &aLeaves&r, &6Dead Bushes&r and almost all things &2natural&r? fear not, a &bLeaf Blower&r can help you with just that!
- Simply &dhold right click&r with it and just &cadmire all the destruction&r that you're gonna be causing!
Let's make a Leaf Blower!
A Hate of All Things Natural
&dPretty straight foward&r with this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r:
- You may &eCharge Any Device&r inside of its &2internal slot&r!
Let's make a Energizer!
Charging
&dPretty straight foward&r with this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r:
- You may &eDischarge Any Device&r inside of its &2internal slot&r!
Let's make a Enervator!
Discharging
&3Actually Additions&r adds a &bvery interesting device&r, one that allows you to produce &bLava out of Energy&r!
- After constructing the &dfollowing structure&r and providing about &e150000FE&r you should be able to &afully automate&r a &cLava Production&r!
Let's make a Lava Factory!
Infinite Lava!

With access to an assembler, it's now possible to make Immersive Engineering and Actually Additions Machines to expand your options for processing. Most of these are optional processing methods that are more suited to on demand tasks.
&3Actually Additions&r adds a very special &bDropper&r that can really make your like easier!
- It will &9Precisely Drop Items&r from its &2internal slot&r in front of it and you may use a &cRedstone Torch&r to configure its &credstone behavior&r.
No, not that Classic Custom Map...
The Best Dropper you'll ever need!
And now that you have a &6Lava Factory&r... this special &bGenerator&r is a real deal!
- By surrounding a &bHeat Collector&r with &c4 Lava Source Blocks&r you'll be &egenerating decent amounts of FE&r!
Let's make a Heat Collector!
Energy out of Lava!
And now that we are getting access to some &dadvanced devices&r from &3Actually Additions&r it is time to get the &6Ultimate Machine from this Mod&r!
- &dSimply Place&r an &bEmpowerer&r at the &2Center&r and skip &22 blocks for each cardinal point&r to place the &bDisplay Stands&r.
- &dOne important thing&r, you only need to give &eFE&r to the &bDisplay Stands&r, not the &bEmpowerer&r itself!
I've got the Power!
Time to Empower Materials!
Want some &6Advanced Devices&r? well, what about a way to &2automatically deliver you materials&r? or even, what about a way to &eautomatically charge your devices&r from anywhere in the world?
- A &bPlayer Interface&r allows you to do just that!
- &n&dIt does not have a GUI&r&r tho, so you'll need to use some &apipes&r for the &aIns and Outs&r!
Let's make a Player Interface!
Interacting with your Inventory

&bCanola Oil&r can be a really good &9Liquid Fuel&r to be used in your Factory, and you may consider it a really good option over other &9Liquid Fuels&r since you may &aenhance it&r as you &2progress in the pack&r.

- First, if you haven't set a way to &bAutomatically Farm Canola&r, consider doing so... one suggestion? You can use &ePNC Drones&r! &dThere's a Questline&r for it in the &6"Attack of the Drones"&r Chapter.
Pressing Canola into an Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part I
As it was mentioned previously &bCanola Oil&r an be &6Refined&r! and the &dfirst stage&r is by using a &bFermenting Barrel&r!
- &dThis process can be a bit slow&r, so may be better if you make more than a &6single barrel&r.
Fermenting Canola Oil into a more Refined Version!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part II
And now, time to &bImprove&r it even more!
- By Using an &3Atomic Reconstructor&r you'll be able to &6Crystallize some Canola Seeds&r.
- &dAfter this process&r, simply drop it into a pool of &6Refined Canola Oil&r to &dInduce an Enhancement Process&r!
Crystallizing Canola Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Part III
And now, the peak of &9Liquid Fuels&r, &bEmpowered Canola Oil&r!
- Just like the previous Step, make some &bEmpowered Canola Seeds&r and drop them into a pool of &6Crystallized Canola Oil&r to induce an &eEmpowering Reaction&r.
Empowering Canola Oil!
Producing and Enhancing Canola Final Part
使用一个&b铁磁芯&r和一些&6模拟电路&r......一种&a自动种庄稼的轻松方法&r！
- The &bFarmer&r from &3Actually Additions&r can gently &2harvest a 9x9 area&r in front of it 100%% automatially, you just need to provide &eEnergy&r and handle the &2Ins and Outs&r!
让我们来做个农具吧！
一种自动种庄稼的轻松方法！
With this special device added by &3Actually Additions&r you shall easily &acollect scattered items&r around your base!
- &dInside of its GUI&r you may configure &aFilter&r and its &erange is a radius of approximately 6 blocks&r.
让我们来做个物品吸收器吧！
Items the Gathering

Vaccum tubes are a rudimentary subcomponent used in some archaic technologies. You'll most likely want these to get into Chicken Breeding and a few other odds and ends. Can be automated with the automated workbench.
By adding a &bLens&r to the &6Atomic Reconstructor Laser&r you may find some interesting utility features.
- &dAnd the Quests&r around this one should highlight just that!
- To make them simply start by &6Reconstructing&r the &bBasic Lens&r.
Lenses can be quite usefull!
Augmenting your Atomic Reonstructor!
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to &9cycle trough&r Minecraft's &cC&r&9o&r&2l&r&eo&r&br&r&ds&r from &aDropped or Placed Blocks/Items&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Color!
Lens of the True Gamer
By using this &bLens&r you'll increase the &eRange of the Reconstructor to 30 Blocks&r and it will cause a &cFiery Explosion&r at its end.
Let's make a Lens of Detonation!
Lens of Kaboom
By using this &bLens&r the &6Reconstructor&r will &cinflict 20 of Damage&r &8&o(or about 10 Hearts)&r&r to the &n&bFirst Entity&r&r hit by its &6Laser&r.
Let's make the Lens of Certain Death!
Lens of Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru
This &bLens&r is a straight up &dimprovement&r to the &6Lens of Certain Death&r, it will consume a bit more &eEnergy&r but &ait will drop EXP and Player Only Loot&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Killer!
Lens of even more Omae Wa mou!
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to Separate &5Enchantments&r to &dEnchanted Books&r!
- Being more specific, it will slip the &5Topmost Enchantment&r from an &2Item&r into a &bBook&r, so you'll need to Drop both an &dEnchanted Item&r aswell as an &bEmpty Book&r.
Let's make the Lens of Disenchanting!
Lens of {1}{W} Destroy target Enchantment
By using this &bLens&r you'll be able to simply convert &aStone into Ores&r!
- Yep, it that simple, although you may need to check &2JEI&r cause some &6Ores&r may not be generated by this &bLens&r and some may be a bit &dRare&r.
Let's make the Lens of the Miner!
An Ancient Lens made by Dwarfs
&6Immersive Engineering&r adds a very interesting mechanic, &2Weapons and Special Ammunition&r for them!
- In this particular quest, We will only highlight the most basic of them, a &bRevolver&r!
1. &dFirst&r make yourself a Common Ammo Blueprint, You'll be using it to fill your &bCartridges&r with &8Gunpowder&r and &9Lead&r.
2. &dThen make sure to&r, of course, make yourself a &bRevolver&r and don't forget, you can place it in an &6Engineer's Workbench&r to Apply &aSkins&r and even &eUpgrades&r!
3. And if you didn't figure how to add &eAmmo&r to your &bRevolver&r, simply &aright click to open its internal chambers&r.
Let's make some Ammo and a Revolver!
Anyway I started Blasting
A Very neat addition from &3Immersive Engineering&r, a &bGarden Cloche&r!
- Simply provide some &9Water&r, &eEnergy&r, a &6Soil&r and and some &2Seeds&r to start growing your &2Crops&r anywhere!
- Also its good to point out that you also provide &lBone Meal&r or items like it to improve your &2Crop growth&r.
- &bThis Device&r may not be the fastest way to grow &2Crops&r, but its definetly a compat way to provide &2Materials for some Automations&r.
Let's make a Garden Cloche
A Pocket Greenhouse
Coming from a simple &6Revolver&r, a &bRailgun&r can be a real improvement, although not that fast to shoot, definetly a strong weapon to have with you.
- But keep in mind, a &bRailgun&r consumes a lot of &eEnergy&r so consider carrying some batteries.

- Oh and don't forget, a &bRailgun&r not only consumes energy but it also requires &6Rods&r, and the ones listed in this quest are the ones compatible with it &a&nbetter materials grant better damage and/or effects&r&r and here's some examples:
- &6Blaze Rods&r set entities on Fire.
- &3End Rods&r can actually hit Endermans.
- &dEnderpearls&r can be shoot from it.
- &bSawblades and Tridents&r can be used to Pierce Armor.
Let's make a Railgun
Any Railgun Ammo
Say hello to my Little Friend!

Kinetic Dynamos are a simple form of passive power generation. Windmills and Waterwheels make very low amounts of energy but they are endless and passive so some may prefer to use them for certain application. It is not recommended to attempt to power fully functional bases on these alone for a multitude of reasons.
A &bEngineer's Toolbox&r can be a handy thing to have in your hotbar, inside of it you have some specific slots for some things, and those include:
- &6Foods&r, &2Tools&r, &eWiring&r and even some &aWildcard Slots for anything you wish&r!
And much more of course!
A Place to Store your Lunch

An &bIE Crusher&r is a good alternative to a &6Macerator&r if you're going for &5looks instead of efficiency&r, or maybe you could set a special &aautomation line that drops the items on it&r? that could be an interesting thing to build!
- Anyway, the &bIE Crusher&r is able to handle a variety of &eCrushing Recipes&r and can be used during progression if you wish to do so.
- Its a &dhuge multiblock&r so make sure to read the &6Engineer's Manual&r for specific Instructions, or maybe consult the image bellow for a quick glance.
Let's make a IE's Crusher!
A Huge Alternative to a Macerator!
Just like an &6Alloy Kiln&r, the &bArc Furnace&r is capable of handling some &ausefull/unique alloying recipes&r aswell as some &3Common Alloy Smelting&r recipes too.
- And of course &ddo not forget how pretty IE can be&r! sometimes you might just want to &eimprove how a section of your base looks&r by using a cool machine like this one ;)
Let's make an Arc Furnace!
A Huge Alloy Smelter
Not the best &bArmor&r if compared to other options.. but it does provide a &aNeat Feature&r!
- 100%% Immunity to &eIE's Wires&r! Usefull if you don't want to spend your precious resources &6insulating wires&r.
Pharaday's Essential Equipment
No More Damage from Wires!

The Multiblock Diesel Generator can accept most standard fuels and will produce 4096 FE/t. This is equivalent to 4 standalone generators and is also slightly more fuel efficiency. Well worth building once you have access to stainless steel.
When it comes to power, diesel engines never run out of steam!
Rev Your Engines!

Once you have Kanthal coils on an Electric Blast Furnace, you can highly process uranium into HE uranium which will allow you to make an alternate type of passive power using Thermoelectric generators.
These will passively produce energy based on the difference in temperature of the blocks on the opposite side of them. For example, lava on one side and ice on the other.

The blast furnace can be upgraded into an improved blast furnace once you get some steel. This improved blast furnace is faster but can become even faster if you add preheaters onto it and supply some power.

The fluid pump can pump fluids from the world directly, if you have a 2x2 pool of water it can also act as an infinite fluid source. This can be useful for providing waters to boilers and other applications before you can craft the water source block from Super Factory Manager.
With an &6Atomic Reconstructor&r now you're able to make some &cRestonia Crystals&r.
- Use them with some other components to now open up a world of &2interesting additions&r!
&8&oPS: But of course, since this is a basic coil, only some basic ones are available with this coil :p&r&r
For all your Basic Additions needs.
A Basic Component
Using some &6Basic Coils&r and &6Golden Carrots&r, you're now able to easily &dAutomate Mob Breeding&r using &3Actually Additions&r!
- And the best thing is, this &bFeeder&r &eRequires no Energy at all&r! just provide enough &2Food&r and it will &6Feed the Mobs&r until a reasonable amount.
&8&oFeed the Mobs, a brand new Map Based Modpack coming to stores near you!&r&r
Let's make an Automatic Feeder!
Automated Feeding
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests0.d: Neotech有多种多样的的箱子可供你选择，它们可以升级或可以拓展容量。你甚至可以附魔原版的箱子来增加它们的存储空间！
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests1.d: 所有木材类型都可以用来制作&e精妙存储&r的物品，使用金合欢木的配方只是其中的一个例子。
你需要一些红石来制作它们，所以请确保你已经获得了一些红石粉或者……
The &bME storage bus&r will attach to external storage or tanks to provide access to and from them as part of your &eAE network&r.
The &bcrystal resonance generator&r will passively generate some power for your digital network using the properties of fluix. Due to its unstable nature however you can only use &6one per network&r. This makes them great for starting new networks or powering one off adhoc networks.
Now that you have your items stored in your system you'll want to be able to &aimport&r and &cexport&r items to enable more advanced automations.

Craft an &ainput&r or &coutput bus&r to get started. Each one will take a channel on your network so keep that in mind. Level emitters can be used for stock keeping or limiting operations and &6do NOT&r use a &6channel&r on your network.
&bCrafting CPUs&r are the central block for enabling your AE system to handle crafting operations for you on its own. You'll need to provide a channel on your network for each crafting cpu.

The crafting cpus are a multiblock structure of crafting storage and optionally &6crafting coprocessors&r and &6crafting monitors&r. The more complex the crafting operations, the more crafting storage each recipe will require.
&bPattern Providers&r will allow you to insert recipes that you've set on Patterns using the &6Pattern Terminal&r.

These can be placed next to &6molecular assemblers&r to provide shape and shapeless crafting grid recipe capabilities to your system or they can be attached to machines to provide instructions for your system to use that machine to perform crafts.
The &bannihilation&r and &bformation panes&r can place blocks or mine them when given a channel and connet to your network (or more commonly, a subnetwork). If you place annihilation panes facing upworld at &6build height&r they can collect &6skystone&r for you as well!
When normal storage and patterns just aren't enough for you anymore you can turn towards MEGA storage solutions. These will help millions of bytes of chemical, liquid and item data. The accumulation processors are the key component in these massive storage technology solutions.
远距离传输流体或搬运物体可能会对你造成一点麻烦。&e维度储罐&r和&e维度箱子&r可以远距离甚至跨维度存储或转移物品！
The Ae2 Controller will allow you to extend your network's channels by 64 channels PER SIDE of the controller face. They also fit together into a multiblock in a variety of closed loop shapes.
在最新版本的&e应用能源&r（简称AE）中搜索栏已被移除。如果想要在数字存储中找到特定物品，你需要使用位于屏幕下方&eEMI&r搜索栏。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests2.d: 忘记有关&6潜影盒&r的一切吧！&e精妙背包&r可以满足你的所有需求。
你可以对&e精妙背包&r进行升级来获得很多实用的功能，比如使用&6虚空升级&r可以通过过滤器来自动将一部分物品销毁！
着手制作升级时，你需要一个过滤升级。因为有许许多多的升级方法，所以请使用EMI确保你找到了所有的升级！
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests3.d: 远古陨石从天空坠落,你可以从这块天空之石的内部层层保护的深处发现带有先进科技的高级电路示意图的神秘方块。从中获取一套完整的压印模板和一些赛特斯石英母岩，将上述物品带回基地种植即可源源不断获得赛特斯石英水晶。&b陨石罗盘&r会为你找到距离你最近的陨石。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests4.d: Now with some fluix you can begin working on your first network. AE2 Devices require channels on your network to operate.

Noramlly you can fit 8 devices per network but we've &ndoubled that in this pack&r to &616 channels&r. You can go even further by incorporating Controllers later, with each face providing you &664 additional channels&r to work with.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests5.d: 要完成处理器的装配工序，你需要一些熔融红石。其中一种办法是在&6高炉中&r制作，另一种方法最好需要有稳定的熔岩来源，使用&6Thermo Pneumatic Processing Plant&r可以更高效的制作熔融红石。熔融红石需要使用管道进入装配机中与其他电路组件一起来完成装配工序。
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests6.d: The crafting terminal will allow you access all items stored within your network and craft with them directly in one place. Like most AE devices &6it will consume a channel on your network&r.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests7.d: You'll need an &bME drive&r bay to house all your storage disks. The &bME drive&r will &6use a channel&r on your network to provide digital access to all storages inserted into it.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests8.d: Storage components are the core of your digital storage. They come in many sizes ranging from 1k to 256k and then even into MEGA variants.
Item storage cells can hold up to 63 &ndistinct types&r of items; the number of items they can store depends in part on how many types they're holding;

Each item type consumes a number of bytes (which varies with the cell size), and each item consumes &6one bit&r of storage, so eight items consume one byte, and a &6full stack of 64 consumes 8 bytes&r.
This will become intuitive as you use the mod but if you find this confusing there are also the &6Typeless drives&r available from &eAe2Things&r that cost a bit more but have no type limitations.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.quests9.d: &b ME Interfaces&r allow you to pipe items &ainto&r and &4out&r of your digital storage. They act a bit like an &aimport&r and &4export&r bus combined. You can set items to &4export&r in the top of the interface's UI and any items you pipe into it will automatically go into your network.
ftbquests.chapter.storage_wars.title: 存储战争
ftbquests.chapter.the_final_challenge.qu: Congratulations! You have reached the pinnacle of technological mastery and completed FTB NeoTech. Your dedication, creativity, and perseverance have led you through countless challenges, and you have emerged victorious.

On behalf of the entire FTB Team, we extend our heartfelt thanks to you for taking this journey with us. Your commitment to exploring and mastering the intricate world of NeoTech has most certainly brought you an immense
Thank you for being a part of our adventure. We hope you enjoyed the experience and look forward to seeing you in future packs!

Once you've got a chicken that laid the fiery egg, or an actually additions lava factory, making lava becomes much less of an issue. To that end we'll not have to keep milking the little clucker for eternity. Once you've produced 10k Buckets of lava you'll gain access to this infinite source.
NOTE: This quest is PETA approved.
ftbquests.chapter.the_garden_beneath.que: The catalyst will work as a portal ignited to allow passage into the &bUndergarden&r. Build a portal frame out of stone bricks and right click the catalyst on the inside of it to engage the portal. Be weary, as there are dangers beyond which may overwhelm the unprepared...
There are many biomes and structures to explore in the Undergarden, a &bNature's Compass&r can assist you in finding any specific ones you may be looking for!
The Undergarden
Enter the Undergarden
The Key to the Door Below
The Undergarden is filled with materials embedded in its native stone.
This stone seems malleable enough to simply &lsmelt directly &rto &bdiamonds&r.
&nINFO: &rThese ores occur at high levels, around Y level 112 and up, with the best place to dig being around Y level 120.
Undergarden Diamonds
Cloggrum is a basic material similar to Iron but a bit stronger in terms of tools and armor. You can mine it throughout the entire dimension. Try making a shield from it!
You can also trade Stoneborn for the mythical Cloggrum Battleaxe, a huge weapon that deals knockback and high damage.

Deep within the lower levels of the Undergarden are ancient labrynths know as the catacombs. You can find them most commonly near the ancient seas but they can occur in most biomes. They will be filled with hostile monsters and A LOT of loot. Be careful and enjoy your bounty!
Locate the Catacombs!

Inside the catacombs you will find Forgotten Guardians. These are the only source of Forgotten Steel which will allow you to upgrade your cloggrum tools and armor into Forgotten Steel variants. These tools and weapons do 1.5x more damage to Undergarden enemies and mine blocks at 1.5.x the speed. They also have a much higher enchantability.
&bVirulent Mix&r can be bucketed up and refined into crude oil for processing.

This process is a bit manual to start so filling tanks to bring back home is a good way to go. The Virulent Mix deposits can occur in many biomes but &a&lVeil Mushroom Bogs&r will have the greated abundance.
Once you can provide a quarry an aluminium drill it will be able to constantly pump this mixture which you can sustainably produce &bcrude oil&r and petrochemical byproducts with.
&6Endermen&r drop &6Ender Pearls&r when killed which can teleport you when you throw them! These can also be combined with &6Blaze Powder&r to guide you to a &6Stronghold&r.
Inside, you'll find a portal that can be activated to take you to the &dEnd Dimension&r. To activate it, you'll need each portal frame filled with an &6Eye of Ender&r.
We can use this same power to create teleportation devices called &eSimple Teleporters&r. To learn more, check the next page!

With this you can bind an &6ender crystal&r to a location  by &6sneak+right clicking the ground&r with it and insert it into the teleporter. Once you step onto the teleporter and sneak you'll be teleported to the set location. You can do this as often as you like and it has no cost. &dThis does not work across dimensions&r, however.
All Seeing Eye
For when the &5Nether&r is too dangerous and filled with too much terrain, the &dVoid&r Dimension provides you with all the empty void needs. Mobs won't spawn and it's always sunny.
Home in the Void
From dangerous structures filled with Piglins, to the never ending sea of lava, the &5Nether&r has many things to offer on your adventures.
Keep an eye out for &eLootr&r Chests and Barrels you find there for some nice loot, alongside looking out for the fabled &6Ancient Debris&r that can be found underground.
P.S. You might also want a &6Golden Armor&r piece or &6Gold Backpack&r to distract some of its inhabitants...
Visit the Nether

When in the &5Nether&r be sure to find one of its Fortresses and slay some &bWither Skeletons&r their &0Wither Skeleton Skulls&r are used to summon the Wither. simply place 3 &0Wither Skeleton Skulls&r ontop of a T shape of &6Soul Sand&r.
Kill &dThe Wither&r
Visit &dThe End&r
The undergarden is filled with many various types of mushrooms. They can be harvested and crafted into various stews and pies, each giving unique effects.
Bloodmushrooms can brew potions of brittleness which increases damage taken and increases it even more so if the target is wearing armor!
Undershrooms
Local Vegetation
Kill The &dEnder Dragon&r

There are strange purple pumpkins and beans growing wild across the Forgotten Fields. Harvest some for food and other crafting processes later. The Gourd can be particularly useful in unlocking a &bMarket&r.
Gourds and Legumes
The water in the Undergarden isn't normal water but a Virulent Mixture that will deal poison if you walk through it. You can avoid this by brewing some poitons of resistance using a Gloom Gourd.
Utherium shards can drop from enemies, be looted from chests or mined from Utherium ores in the undergarden. When crafted into crystals they act as a powerful material for weapons, tools and armor.
Rotwalkers and Rotbeasts are a common source of these shards.
Iron, Gold, and Coal variants of Undergarden ores are found commonly throughout most biomes. You can process them as you would any normal ore. Noteably, &6Gold&r does not spawn in cold biomes.
Undergarden Common Ore
Common Ores
&bRegalium&r can be found as ore and looted in chests throughout the Undergarden. This crystal is highly sought after by the denizens of the deep known as the &lStoneborn&r.
You can use it to trade with them like Villagers.
You can find them anywhere but they particularly like &aWigglewood Forests&r.

Utheric equipment is better than diamond tier gear and deals additional damage to &erotspawn&r of all type. It has a good enchantability level as well. It's worth aquiring a full set of this armor and a sword for fighting the enemies in the Undergarden.
Utherium Gear
