Froststeel Ore only spawns in cold biomes in place of where gold would have spawned. Weapons made from Froststeel will slow enemies when hitting them. The armor gives knockback resistance and high defense. but slows you down slightly.
ftbquests.chapter.the_spice_of_life.ques: Enables your multiblock kitchen to make recipes that require standard crafting grid recipes.
The sink will provide water to recipes. &6It cannot provide water to other non kitchen appliance&r via piping.
The Inspiration for most Modpacks
The &bMarket&r will allow you to trade emeralds for almost every type of crop available to perfect your garden to your liking.
This little piggie...
The &btool rack&r will allow you to place your Pam's cooking instruments like bakeware on it and automatically use them to prepare recipes in your multiblock kitchen.
Gardens can provide many of the various crops from Pam's Harvestcraft. You can get them from village loot or from trading on the Amadron Network.
Harvest Time!

In need for some milk but are your local cows to far away? Worry not a &bCow in a Jar&r is there for your milky needs. To obtain one of these fabled Jars you need to find a wild &6cow&r put it ontop an &6Milk Jar&r and let an &6Anvil&r drop ontop of it.
&l&6Note&r: there needs to be 1 Air block between the cow and the falling anvil
哞？
A &bKitchen Floor&r can be used to connect kitchen appliances alongside being able to be dyed, never have your Kitchens looked as fancy as they are functional!

FTB Neotech includes The Spice of Life: Oninon Edition. This version will reward you with buffs and extra hearts for eating a varied diet. You can check you current diversity, as well as foods you have eaten in the &2food book&r. Craft one to get started working on improvements.
&2The Spice of Life&r
To get started with &6Cooking For Blockheads&r, you'll need to craft the guide book first! The first book just requires you to smelt a book, so get.... cooking?
The next book requires a little bit more of an investment, but it's essential for crafting the core blocks needed for a proper kitchen!
It's called a cookbook for a reason

This is the main counter space for your multiblock kitchen. They are optional but you can combine them anyway you like to make your kitchen look nice. &6These can by dyed to suit your colorful needs&r.
These act as decorative storage for the multiblock kitchen. They are optional but adding more will provide more storage for food.
Most of the Kitchen Blocks can be &6Dyed&r to meet your Aesthetic requirements.
Primary ingredient storage for your recipes. It can be upgraded as well to provide additional functionality.
When an &bice unit&r is placed in the fridge as an ugrade it will provide snow and ice to cooking recipes automatically.
Used to providing cooking processes for recipes that require it. It's also &6upgradeable and Dyeable.&r
The heating upgrade will allow you to provide FE energy to your oven instead of burnable fuels.
&bThe feeding trough&r will provide food for all nearby animals in order to allow them to breed automatically.

&bThe chicken nest&r will collect nearby eggs that chickens drop. You can place a hopper under it to pipe into the storage of your choice. No more need to cram all your chickens into a block over a hopper.
The Chicken came home to roost.

You can enhance the speed and yield of your crops with these &benhanced fertilizers&r. One you apply them to the farmland it lasts forever. Combined with worms from Actually Additions, Crop Supports from Pneumaticcraft and Optionally Greenhouse Glass your crops will be growing in no time!
Get green thumb
Enhanced Fertilizer
Enhanced Fertilizer
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests0: A lot goes into making a Nuclear Reactor, and there are many types. To explain the process as well as possible, check out the Reactor Components and Reactor Mechanics quests.
Nuclear Reactors produce a lot of energy, primarily as Steam.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests1: The most basic available reactor fuel is a regular Uranium Fuel Rod. It requires no fancy processing, but also outputs the least energy. However, its simplicity makes it appealing to start with.
Because EMI is likely making your head spin at trying to understand this, here is a simplistic overview of the many reactor mechanics.
Temperature: When a Thermal Neutron is absorbed, it raises the temperature of the component in question.
Thermal Conductivity: The ability for the component to transmit heat. Sends heat from hot things to less hot things.

Neutron Emission: Fuel rods emit neutrons, which start reactions. Neutrons can be Fast or Thermal, with a percent chance of being either per neutron. Fuel rods can emit the maximum number of neutrons as seen in EMI or less depending on the temperature the fuel rod is at. Fuel rods will also emit neutrons when they absorb incoming neutrons.

Neutron Absorption: Fuel rods and reactor components have a chance to absorb an incoming fast neutron. If this occurs, the fuel rod will emit more neutrons, while other components will take a tick of durability.

Neutron Scattering: Incoming neutrons have a chance to be deflected into other spaces. The direction it travels it random. The neutron type has a chance to become either Fast or Thermal, depending on the chance listed on the component's EMI page.

Neutron Travel: If a traveling Neutron does NOT scatter or absorb, it "passes through" the component, maintaining its direction of travel. If a neutron travels onto an unoccupied space (AKA any non-hatch), it disappears.
Welcome to the nuclear age! It worth upgrading much of your infrastructure with EV-tier machine hulls.
The Highly Advanced Machine Hulls will be used for nearly all your EV tier technologies.
The High Pressure Advanced Steam Boiler is a direct upgrade for the High Pressure Steam Boiler and can produce up to 8192 mb/t of Steam.
As with most boilers, to achieve maximum efficiency, the boiler must be in continuous operation. It only accepts High-Pressure Water and High-Pressure Heavy Water so you have to use a pressurizer.
Besides processing tiny iridium as part of the platinum processing chain you can also obtain iridium ores directly from the titianium drill.

Super conducting ingots are the higher tier of energy transfer available. You can use them to make cabling that transfer an astounding 1.024G Eu/t. This metal is also used for many of the late game technology recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests2: Titanium Drills are essential for producing mass quanities of Uranium, Iridium, and Fluorite. You're going to need a fair amount of Uranium for nuclear power, as well as Iridium for highly advanced components.
To a Nuclear Reactor, you'll need Nuclear Alloy Plates. These are crafted using Blastproof Ingots, Beryllium Ingots, and Cadmium Ingots.
To get Beryllium, you'll need to centrifuge Emeralds. Cadmium can be obtained by centrifuging Mozanite, which you should already hasve processing.

Once you have Nuclear Mixed Plates, blow them up in an Implosion Compressor to create Nuclear Alloy Plates. You’ll need plenty of these for your reactors so its worth setting up a good automation line for them.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests3: Uranium 235 is a rare isotope of Uranium, as opposed to Uranium 238, its more common sibling. When processing nuclear fuel rods that used 235 in their recipe, you will get back 2/3 of the 235 you used to create it, meaning that you will need to constantly be centrifuging Uranium to get more 235.
These produce more energy than the regular Uranium Fuel Rods, but less than Plutonium-based ones.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests4: Plutonium is a manufactured material from depleted fuel rods. To get a lot of it, you might want to invest in a Breeder Reactor.

A Breeder Reactor is generally one which seeks to process fuel rods as quickly as possible with little regard for efficiency. Of course, you will need to be generating Uranium at a quick enough rate to supply it.
Plutonium rates (per rod) are as follows (Tiny Dust in -> Tiny Dust out):
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests5: MOX Fuel is generally superior to regular Uranium Fuel, with an added benefit that it produces more Plutonium than it takes to make it. A 1.33x surplus, to be precise.
This does NOT make it suitable for dedicated Plutonium production, but it does mean that you don't lose much by using it. Its high neutron output might be appealing.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests7: Deuterium is a byproduct of Water in a Nuclear Reactor when it is hit with a Fast Neutron. It can be used to make Heavy Water.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests8: Tritium is the byproduct of when Heavy Water gets hit by a Fast Neutron in a Nuclear Reactor.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.quests9: There are a lot of reactor components to keep track of, so here is a list of each of them and their function(s):

&bWater&r: Comes in several varieties. Pressurized versions are more energy-dense, and Heavy Water produces Tritium instead of Deuterium. Produces Deuterium when absorbing a Fast Neutron and increases in temperature (and turns to Steam) when absorbing a Thermal Neutron.
&bCadmium Control Rod&r: A special component that has a high chance of absorbing incoming Thermal Neutrons.

&bFuel Rods&r: These come in many varieties, and are your main nuclear force. They are responsible for providing the reactor with energy. Quad Rods last much longer than Single or Dual Rods (while they theoretically last 4x longer, this might not be the case, as higher reactivity will cause them to degrade quicker). Their emissivity decreases with temperature.
&bPlates&r: A general-use conductive and reflective surface. Has a high chance of converting incoming Fast Neutrons into Thermal Neutrons.

&bHeat Exchanger&r: A component designed for managing internal reactor temperature. Has a high thermal conductivity, meaning it can take heat from adjacent sources and send it to adjacent destinations.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_extreme.title: 6. To the EXTREME
ftbquests.chapter.use_the_forcecraft.que: 想要开始&6力量工艺&r，你需要获取一些&6力量宝石&r。
获取这些宝石需要你深入研究&a实用拓展&r，从而能够使用贴附有&6矿工透镜&r的原子再构机，将绿宝石块转化为力量宝石块。
你也可以用同样的方法转化绿宝石矿。
&6力量灌注台&r基本可以说成是力量工艺的&d附魔台&r！
与原版的附魔机制不同，你可以放入特定的物品来给你的工具和护甲附加对应&6灌注&r，也可以用于制作一些高级物品，比如&a时间火把&r。
要解锁灌注配方，你需要升级你的&6升级册&r。每次升级都需要完成特定的灌注至少一次，这条任务线将会指引你完成并解锁各个升级！
这些剪刀能剪包括羊在内的许多动物，给它们一件舒适的冬季外衣！
制作一个&b升级核心&r需要将力量权杖与经验册合成，这个配方需要经验册内有至少原版7.5级的经验，也就是100点经验。
用&b附魔之瓶&r灌注升级核心就能得到一个经验核心，这个核心可以用于力量熔炉，使熔炉产生更多经验。
经验核心
在力量灌注台中用&b附魔之瓶&r灌注一本书将得到经验册，可以用于存储经验以备之后使用。
等级2
将&b雪饼&r灌注于力量弓可以为箭矢附加冻结效果；灌注于升级核心则可以获得冻结核心，以解锁力量熔炉中的冷冻配方。
冻结升级
将&b燧石&r灌注于升级核心可以获得磨光核心，这个核心插入力量熔炉后可以使其变成一个磨粉机。
磨光核心
&b力量背包&r基本上可以说是一个普通的背包，虽然初始槽位很少，但它可以用力量灌注台升级。
这个背包看起来很可疑
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
制作并吃掉一块&b幸运饼干&r，你将得到你的&b幸运签&r。将&b幸运签&r灌注于力量剑或弓可以获取抢夺魔咒；灌注于其它工具可以获取时运魔咒；灌注于力量护甲可以使你的力量拳套带有抢夺效果。
将&b蓝色染料&r灌注于力量剪刀将给予其&4R&r&ca&r&ei&r&2n&r&9b&r&1o&r&5w&r效果，剪羊毛时掉落随机颜色的羊毛。
&4R&r&ca&r&ei&r&2n&r&9b&r&1o&r&5w&r剪刀
你可能已经注意到，力量工艺强化手册初始为0级。为了升级强化手册，你需要每种注魔至少使用一次，且还需确保使用了足够的注魔以获取所需的经验值。在0级时，您需要将蝙蝠&b爪子&r注入到剑、弓或力量护甲中。
将&b爪&r灌注于力量剑可以获取锋利I魔咒；灌注于力量弓可以获取力量I魔咒；灌注于力量护甲则可以使你的力量拳套增加固定数值的伤害。
等级0
将&b糖&r灌注于升级核心可以获得速度核心，这个核心放入力量熔炉后，就如其名称所示，可以加速它们。
速度核心
将&b箭&r灌注于力量弓、箭、或护甲将赋予它们流血，使你的攻击造成流血伤害。
等级3
将&b隐身药水&r灌注于力量权杖后，只要权杖还有耐久，玩家就可以根据自己的需求使用隐身药水效果；而灌注于力量护甲将使护甲隐形，展现你令人惊艳的皮肤！
迷彩
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
力量背包升级II
将&b蜘蛛网&r灌注于力量工具可以获取精准采集魔咒。
丝触
将&b蜘蛛眼&r灌注于力量剑、弓或护甲可以获取祸根，一个强大的灌注效果，能无效特定生物的能力，例如苦力怕将不会爆炸，末影人将无法传送。
等级4
将&b金色能量源&r灌注于升级核心则可以获得热量核心，允许你用更少的燃料熔炼更多物品。
热量升级
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
力量背包升级III
将&b恶魂之泪&r灌注于力量权杖后，只要权杖还有耐久，玩家就可以使用这个力量权杖治疗自身。
等级5
将&b力量背包升级&r灌注于力量背包可以为你可疑的背包增加8个槽位。
&4注意：升级册的每个等级中，都仅能进行一次背包升级。
我们需要使用力量权杖来为我们自己制作一本&6升级册&r，以使用本模组的主要功能方块之一。
&6升级册&r可以通过完成特定&d灌注&r来升级，我们将会在下一个任务中详细讲述。把它当作是附魔物品就好！
将&b羽毛&r灌注于力量剑使你可以右键将自己向前推动一段距离。但请注意，这消耗耐久。
羽翼
将&b末影珍珠&r灌注于力量弓将使被击中的敌人随机传送；而灌注于力量权杖或力量剑将使它们可以被用作传送装置。
等级6
将&b黑曜石&r灌注于力量护甲将减少身穿该护甲的实体所受伤害；而灌注于工具则会使工具获得耐久魔咒。
强健
将&b时钟&r灌注于力量火把将给你一个你所能获取的最强大工具之一，&b时间火把&r，这个火把可以加速附近的机器。
将&b荧石&r灌注于力量权杖，使用者可以获得使附近生物发光的能力；灌注于力量弓则可以使被击中的生物发光。
等级7
将&b宝藏核心&r灌注于力量斧或力量剑将使生物开始掉落宝藏卡，可以用于制作战利品袋，这些战利品袋装有一些好东西。当你完成了这一灌注，你就完成了力量工艺所提供的所有灌注！
将一个力量宝石与2个&6铁锭&r或2个&6金锭&r合成就能得到&6力量锭&r。使用铁锭合成只能得到2个力量锭，而用金锭则可以得到3个！
&6力量权杖&r是你在本模组中将要使用的第一个主要物品！
这个权杖可以用于将特定物品拆解为它其中一种原料，也可以用于制作几种重要方块和物品！
在力量工艺中，&b砂轮&r将是你的好朋友，它使你能够祛除惹人厌烦的工具上的魔咒，并使用同一把工具来升级你的升级册。
将&b糖&r灌注于力量工具可以获取效率魔咒；灌注于力量弓可以使它的箭矢飞得更快；而灌注于力量护甲可以使穿着这件护甲的实体的速度提高一个固定的数值。
等级1
将&b力量原木&r灌注于力量斧将使其获得一次砍倒整棵树的能力。
将&b力量粒&r灌注于力量剑可以获取击退I魔咒。你需要完成这个灌注至少一次才能将你的升级册升级为等级1。
&b金色能量源&r可以灌注于大部分力量工具来使它们产生高温；灌注了这一能力的力量剪刀可以在剪动物时点燃它们；灌注了这一能力的每件力量护甲将会使玩家的攻击附加一个固定数值的火焰伤害。
ftbquests.chapter.useful_utilities.quest: &bA Building Gadget&r can pretty much &dsolve any problems that you've had or probably will have&r with &2Building&r!
- Its advised to set a keybind to open the Menu.
- On its Menu, you'll be able to use a variety of &2building functions&r, like placing a row of blocks from where you're looking to where you are.
Or maybe placing a grid of &etorches&r to keep your base lit. Or even placing entire &2walls, floors and ceilings&r with a single click.
The Possibilities are endless! These gadgets are &2handy companions for builders&r.
For Dire Builders
A Dire's Gadget
The &bSlimesling and Slime Boots&r let you travel the landscape rather quickly. The boots even protect you from fall damage, at the cost of forcing you to bounce unless you hold sneak.
Modular Routers are versatile tools for logistics and world interaction. There are many Modules that you can insert into them, which all do different things. Most of them are self explanatory.
MAKE SURE YOU ENABLE FAKE PLAYERS IN CLAIM CHUNKS!
Are you tired of the Wandering Trader? Is he pushing you around while you are looking at your quests? Now you can make a sign to solve all of your problems!
This sign prevents traders from spawning in a 100 block radius from the sign.
"Or you can just keep killing them for me." - AlfredGG
&bThis Neat Pouch&r allows you to slowly collect &eTime&r as you keep it &ain your Inventory.&r
- After some its accumulated, you can &dright click to release it into any block&r!
- And well... this is really usefull to &6quickly smelt or process something that you're in need&r!
Let's make a Time in a Bottle!
A Temporal Pouch for all your Temporal Problems!
Just like the &6Compact Machines Mod&r, &bA Hyperbox&r is able to provide a &e13x13x13&r Area&r for anything that you desire!
- One thing to keep note is that you'll need to use the &bApperture Blocks&r inside of it to move items, redstone signals and even yourself &aIn and Out&r of it.
Let's make a HyperBox!
A Compact Space for your Compact Machines!
T&bhis Powerfull Torch&r shall completely stop &cAgressive Mob Spawning&r on an radious of &a64x32 Blocks&r.
- &2Very Usefull&r if you're tired of &6Mobs on your base&r!
Let's make a Diamond Magnum Dong
Completely Removing Mobs from your Base!
The &bMagnet&r is a nifty gadget that attracts nearby item entities to you.
The &bHang Glider&r is a way to cross long horizontal distances, so long as you start from a high y-level.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_utilities.title: Useful Utilities
ftbquests.chapter.warning_high_voltage.q: The turbo machine hull is High Voltage machine block base. Similarly to the Advanced Machine frames your existing machines can all be upgraded to this new voltage should you wish.

The stainless steel drill will allow you access to new and important materials in the electric quarry. You can obtian important ores like Titanium, Platinum and Tungsten. Using these drills in the oil drilling rig will also produce shale oil now which can be further distilled into most of your petrochemical needs.

You'll need mixed blastproof ingots to make the implosion compressor, which can then make mixed blastproof ingots more efficiently. You'll need to make enough manually in a normal compressor to get there though.
The implosion compressor is used to place items under much more intense pressure than a normal compressor. This allows you to transform dusts and and ingots into highly blast resistant materials.
Most of these materials will be required for Nuclear technologies.
Platinum Sulfuric Solution
Purified Platinum Sulfuric Solution
Shale oil can be collected with the drilling rig using stainless steel drills. You want to then run this through a 3 high distillation tower to get helium, sulfuric naptha and sulfuric crude oil.
Shale Oil Processing

Once you've obtained sulfuric crude oil you can process it with hydrogen in a chemical reactor to get sulfuric acid and crude oil or in a Thermo Pneumatic Processing plant to get sulfur dust and crude oil. The processing route you chose is up to you, both will work.
Sulfuric Crude Processing

The sulphuric naptha will first need to be combined with hydrogen in a chemical reactor to extract the sulfur in the form of sulfuric acid. This will leave pure naptha for you to further distill. You now need to steam crack the Naptha in another chemical reactor by providing steam and naptha to make steam cracked naptha for further distilling.
Sulfuric Naptha Processing

The distillation tower is a much better way of breaking down petrochemicals into byproducts. It can stack in a multiblock with multiple outputs. You can have as few as one output or as many as nine to break down all possible byproducts.
Note: Make sure you set the height of the structure in the controller so that it will properly form.
Ideally, you'll process Steam-Cracked Naphtha in a Distillation Tower with 8 outputs. The 8 dependent quests to this one show all of the outputs.
Steam Cracked Naptha Processing
Diesel can be used as a fuel, or enriched into Boosted Diesel with the help of some Diethyl Ether.
Diesel
&6Boosted Diesel&r is the best liquid fuel. Note that you will need Diethyl Ether to make it (found in the petrochem distillation tree directly below).

&lAlternatively&r, you can create &bempowered canola seeds&r and boost it in a Thermo Pneumatic Processing Plant using Diesel and the empowered canola! This is a fun alternate method of making boosted.
Boosted Diesel
Propene is used to make Acrylic Acid.
Propene
Butadiene is used to make Styrene-Butadiene.
Butadiene
You already made some Ethylene for Digital Circuits, but this is another way of getting it.
Ethylene
Benzene can be used to make more Ethylbenzene. It can also be used to make Nylon to duplicate String, but I somehow doubt that's useful to you.
It can also be used to dupe Dyes, which might be of minor use to you.
Benzene
Toluene can be used to make Industrial TNT which is important for use in the implosion compressor, you'll want to setup a small automation chain for this.
Toluene
Ethylbenzene is used to make Styrene.
Ethylbenzene
Vinyl Chloride is used to make Polyvinyl Chloride (you might know it as PVC).
Vinyl Chloride
The heat exchanger cools items down to produce other items or liquids. This can create a faster ingot cooling process as well as being useful for high pressure closed loop systems.
Acetylene is still used to make Vinyl Chloride. You can turn all of your methane into Acetylene as well.
Acetylene (From Methane)
You'll have to make Hydrochloric Acid the same way you were making it before.
Hydrochloric Acid
Industrial TNT is used for the Implosion Compressor.
Acrylic Acid is used to make Diethyl Ether. It can also be used to make Acrylic Glue, in the event you want to duplicate Slimeballs for some reason.
Acrylic Acid
You should have plenty of extra Oxygen from Electrolzying Water for Hydrogen.
Alternatively, you can Centrifuge Liquid Air, which you will need to do for Nitrogen and Argon anyway.
Oxygen
Ethylene and Benzene can be combined to make more Ethylbenzene.
Ethylbenzene (From Ethylene and Benzene)
Styrene can be used to make Styrene-Butadiene.
Styrene
Styrene-Butadiene can be processed into Styrene-Butadiene Rubber.
Styrene-Butadiene
Polyvinyl Chloride is used for advanced electronic components, upgrades, and superconductors.
Polyvinyl Chloride
While you have Ethanol from your Distilleries and Sugar Solution, perhaps you could also make more using your excess Sulfuric Acid and Ethylene?
Ethanol
Diethyl Ether is used to turn Diesel and Biodiesel into Boosted Diesel.
Diethyl Ether
Crude Oil can be processed in two different ways.
The first is to use PneumaticCraft's Refinery to get Diesel and LPG directly. This is the simpler method. You can also use the LPG to make Raw Biodiesel.

The second is to make another Distillation Tower and split the Crude Oil. This produces more Sulfurized Naphtha, as well as Sulfurized Light Fuel and Sulfurized Heavy Fuel. If you process those last two out and recombine them, you can get far more Diesel than you would via Refinery. However, it does take more work and more power.
Crude Oil
Styrene-Butadiene is a super insulator, can make tons of Rubber at a time, and can replace the liquid Rubber in some recipes.
It's also used for Random Access Memory.
Styrene-Butadiene Rubber
Monocrystaline Boules can be cut into silicon wafers for advanced processor recipes and RAM.
The Pressurizer is a special machine that can convert water into High Pressure Water and Steam, and it can also do the reverse.
If you're planning to use the High Pressure Large Steam Boiler, you'll need the Pressurizer to produce High Pressure Water or High Pressure Steam.
To generate Liquid Air with the Pressurizer, make sure you have an Item Input Hatch for the Air Intake.
The High Pressure Steam Boiler can produce up to 2048 mb/t of steam. High Pressure Steam is worth 8 times more than regular steam so each mb will produce 8 eu/t instead of 1.
As with all boilers, to reach maximum efficiency it needs to run continuously. It only accepts High Pressure Water and High Pressure Heavy Water.
Pressurizing water into HP water consumes a lot of energy and the Large Steam Turbine will not return it. You can use a Heat Exchanger to recover the HP water for another cycle though.
Using the recipe that takes steam and HP water as inputs and outputs regular water and HP steam.
Note: Be cautious of the recipe amounts, as you might need higher tiers of hatches to meet the recipe requirements.
You'll know your hatches are too small if the recipes fail to start processing.
The Large Steam Turbine converts either regular or HP steam energy. It generates up to 16,384 EU/t.
However, it won't return regular or HP water. To recycle HP Water, you will need to use a heat exchanger.

Until now Monzanite hasn't been very useful except for the neodynium. Now you'll want to start fully extracting it for the Yttrium and Cadmium as well which are require for the most advanced super conducting alloys.
Advanced Components

Annealed copper is copper that has been heat-treated to make it softer, more flexible, and easier to work with. This is a nescesary component for all of the advanced tier components. It's made by cooking copper in an EBF while providing a source of oxygen.
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.descri: &dFTB\u00a0NeoTech&r邀请您探索一个充满无穷奇迹的科技世界，你可以发现未知的风景，勇闯神秘的地牢，或是揭开尘封已久的秘密。无论你是经验老道的工程师还是初出茅庐的冒险家，&dNeoTech&r都是你可以尽情宣泄自身创造力的舞台！
准备好，勇敢启程，&l冒险就要开始了&r！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.title: 欢迎来到&9NeoTech&r！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests1.descri: 带有&6齿轮形状&r的任务会引导你解锁更多的章节！
请以这些任务为目标努力冲刺吧！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests1.title: &a递推章节&r的任务
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests2.title: &a缩写的词汇&r
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests3.descri: &6EMI&r与JEI类似，但是有一些非常实用的额外功能！
在配方树中你可以看到底部有一个放大镜按钮，点击它将切换为合成网格。返回物品栏时，它会显示大量的，递进的你所需要合成的物品清单，其中也包括中间产物。一些物品无法直接获得，也就是液体，但如果你能获得它们的衍生物，它们仍然会被视为“已获得”，例如用液态橡胶合成橡胶片。
更重要的是，箱子中需要的物品会高光指示！他会告诉你存储系统中需要的物品以及它在哪里。以便于搜索、
与这位竞争对手相比，这个模组的优势是可以帮助你查看&6配方树&r。
除了常用的使用Shift点击来将配方移动至工作台以外，还有两个新按钮，分别是“收藏夹”按钮和一个“配方树”按钮。

当你查看一个物品的“配方树”时，你点击过“默认配方”按钮的配方将会成为路径上的默认配方。点击“配方树”按钮你可以看到配方需要的所有材料，你可以点击材料来将它的配方加入“默认配方”以继续将“配方树”衍生，直到总耗材令你满意的形式为止。在早期游戏中，你应该尽量多的将合成配方加入默认配方，因为它可以准确告诉你合成一个东西需要多少基础材料，从而大大简化合成成本计算。等各方面较为成熟，你应该逐渐删减已自动化组件（泵，电机等）的配方。
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests3.tasks0: 我已完整阅读以下事项！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests3.title: &6EMI&r - &b提示和小技巧&r
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests4.descri: 一旦你找到了安身之所，别忘了使用&6/sethome&r命令！
设置好后，你随时可以用&6/home&r来返回这个地点。
&c请注意&r，使用上述指令需要一段准备时间，所以这并不会帮你从战斗中脱困！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests4.title: 金窝银窝不如自家的&2小窝&r！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.title: 欢迎
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests0: To get started with breeding and cross-breeding chickens, you'll need to get some treated wood and a &bphantom membrane&r.

You can obtain the membrane by killing phantoms that show up after 3 nights of not sleeping or they can be left as gifts for you from pet cats. Alternatively you can directly purchase a chicken catcher from the Amadron network once you've unlocked an &bAmadron Tablet&r.
The &bChicken Catcher&r allows you to capture chickens. Who would've thought!
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests1: While chickens can be bred in the world, they will only produce the offspring of one of the parents. Additionally their stats won't increase beyond 1/1/1.

In order to properly cultivate better and more varied chickens, you will need an &6Incubator&r. Once the two parents are placed inside, you can give them seeds to have a chance at producing an egg of a new chicken variety or a stronger variant of the parents.
Bred by combining a Redstone and Nether Quartz Chicken.
Bred by combining a Nether Quartz Chicken and a Yellow Chicken.
Bred by combining a Red and Sand Chicken.
Bred by combining a Snowball Chicken and a Sand Chicken.
Bred by combining a Sand Chicken and a Flint Chicken.
A log chicken and an Ink Black Chicken has a chance to produce a string chicken egg in the breeder.
Bred by combining a log and flint chicken in the breeder.
Bred by combining a Lapis Blue and a Log Chicken.
Bred by combining a Bone White chicken and a Flint Chicken.
Bred by combining an Iron Chicken with a Yellow Chicken.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests2: Once you have the chicken egg for the new chicken, you'll need to &bincubate&r the egg.

Eggs require a specific heat and humidity to properly incubate or the egg will become unviable. You will need to &osupply the incubator with water&r via buckets or piping and energy for the internal lighting. Once powered, you need to &nadjust the heat&r to be within the target levels which will depend on your biome.
After incubation reaches 100%%, the eggs will hatch into new chickens and ready to be put into breeders to produce eggs for resource or continue cross breeding.
&cNOTE&r: &nHaving more than 10 Chickens in a chunk will stop chickens from laying eggs entirely.&r
Bred by combining a Lava Chicken and a Gold Chicken.
Bred by combining a Glass Chicken and a Gold Chicken.
Bred by combining a Diamond Chicken and a Cactus Green Chicken.
Bred by combining a Nether Wart Chicken and a Diamond Chicken.
Bred by combining a Bone White Chicken and a Blaze Chicken.
Bred by combining a Water Chicken and an Emerald Chicken.
Bred by combining a String and Cocoa Brown Chicken.
Bred by combining a Snowball Chicken with a Gunpowder Chicken.
Bred by combining a Coal and Nether Quartz Chicken.
Bred by combining a Lava Chicken and a Water Chicken.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests3: When chickens lay eggs, they can either be put in the &bIncubator&r to hatch into new chickens,  or those eggs can be turned into resources. In order to turn the egg into its raw resource, you need to pass it through the &bEgg Cracker&r.
This requires a bit of power, as does the incubator, which you can supply with &nModern Industrialization&r power but we've also provided you a passive generator to help get you started.
Bred by combining a Cocoa Brown Chicken and a Glowstone Chicken.
Bred by combining a Clay Chicken and a Cactus Green Chicken.
Bred by combining a Water Chicken and a Lapis Blue Chicken.
Bred by combining a Slime Chicken and a Blaze Rod Chicken.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests4: Chickens can be fed various items to &nconvert&r them into a different kind of chicken. We'll start with the basic smart chicken which has a faster egg production rate than a normal chicken. Find a wild chicken and &bright click it with a book&r to transform it. Once you've done this, right click it with the chicken catcher to turn it into item form for breeding later.
&nCheck the uses for a Chicken&r in EMI to view all the combinations of items you can feed chickens. Most of the Dye variants are covered by this conversion method.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests5: Besides the type of chickens you can convert such as the smart and black dye chicken, some chickens &nyou must find naturally&r. Once you've found them you can then &bbreed them with other chickens&r to create more unique variations. This quest will direct you to each of the wild chickens and further down the breeding lines.
This quest starts with the log chicken, which is the most common of all the wild spawn chickens.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests6: Found in most nether biomes near netherack.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests7: Spawns most commonly in beach and desert biomes.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests8: Soul sand chickens will spawn rarely on soul sand in the nether.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.quests9: Spawns most commonly in plains and forest biomes.
ftbquests.chapter.what_the_cluck.title: What the Cluck?
ftbquests.chapter.wheels_of_fortune.ques: It all starts with the &bCart Assembler&r. Craft one of these and gather plenty of &6coal&r to &6burn&r for &6fuel&r while it processes and you can dive into the next step of actually assembling your first functional train.

To get your first cart going you're going to need to get the components that you'll put together into a functional cart with the &6Cart Assembler&r (Be sure to supply it with fuel). Start with a &bbasic coal engine&r, some &bstorage&r, a &bstandard hull&r and a &bseat&r. You can later exchange out the seat for a &6solar engine&r or something else if you like.
The &6Woodcutter&r is the primary function of this train and it's a bit expensive early on so we've given you one to get you going!

The &bCargo Manager&r is what allows you to interface with your cart. You'll need to put an &6advanced detector rail&r in front of it so that the cart knows to stop and interact with the &bCargo Manager&r.

The center button of the Cargo Manager toggles the type of inventory &ainput&r and &coutputs&r and allows you to color code them according to the colors on the side of the Manager. The simplest approach to get things running is to click it until it says all slots share all sides. From here you can set the color of each input and output to whichever color is facing your advanced detector track.

Set the Storage Slots to &cexport&r from the Cart by clicking the arrow to change the direction. Set the Cargo to be deposited into the cart. This will keep a lot of burnables inserted into the cart for it to do work while the rest can be piped out from the top.
The Cargo Manager's &aInput&r/&cOutputs&r are highly configurable so we wont cover all of them here but feel free to experiment or check out some guides if you want to get more into it!

The &bAdvanced Detector Rail&r is essential for your cart system to know when it should &6stop&r and &6interact&r with a &6cargo manager&r. You can have multiples of these along your track to serve a multitude of purposes such as refilling, offoading cargo, crafting stations, or moving liquids and much more.

The &bExternal Distributor&r sits &6on top&r of the &6Cargo Manager&r and can give you greater control over which sides you interact with and how. In it's UI you can change the colors to match configurations you've set inside the Manager and &6pipe directly&r from the &6Distributor&r.

Once you assemble the &bcart&r, place it down on the rails, &6right click&r to open its inventory and &6supply&r it with &6saplings&r and &6fuel&r and it should start working on its own. Over time the &6saw&r may &6degrade&r so check every so often and &6replenish&r it by putting a &6diamond&r in the repair material slot.

Modules allow you to upgrade the Cart Assembler directly by sneak+right clicking the module onto one of the sides of the block. They can provide a myriad of functional improvements to the cart. Explore some of the many upgrades you can craft and here's a few useful ones to get you started!

Each tier of &6drill, farmer&r and &6tree chopper&r needs &6repair material&r to continue functioning. &bBasic tier&r equipment will take &blow covalence dust&r in its repair slot to repair. &9Hardened versions&r will require &9medium covalence&r and &1top tier&r cutters will require &1high covalence dust&r to repair.
If your cart's tool runs out of durability and doesnt have any repair material it will stop working so make sure you keep it stocked.
